title: Pharmacognosy of Chinese Medicines
requirements: For BCM Majors only.
description: Pharmacognosy of Chinese Medicines introduces the characteristics and classification of herbal plants. In addition, it would introduce the harvesting, processing, storage, chemical composition, pharmacological effects of Chinese herbal medicines. It would also give information on the resources of Chinese herbal medicines in southern China, the efficacy and characteristics of Chinese herbal medicines in Hong Kong. This is the fundamental course for study of Chinese Medicines. After finishing the course, students are expected to master the basic knowledge for learning clinical applications of Chinese Medicines.

title: Basic Theory of Chinese Medicine
description: Through an introductory survey of the basic theories in Chinese medicine, topics like theories of yin-yang, vital activities of the body, meridians, viscera and bowels, causes and mechanisms of diseases, methods of diagnosis, as well as the principles and methods of treatment will be dealt with.
outcome: 本课程属于中医专业的基础课程。通过本课程的学习，要求同学掌握中医学的哲学基础、中医学对正常人体的认识及治疗原则，为日后同学学习中医诊断学、中药学、方剂学和中医临床各科打好基础。  1. 理解并掌握中医基础理论与中国传统哲学之间的关系，能运用元气论、阴阳理论及五行理论认识一般的自然现象与天人合一的原理；理解传统中医学中特有的思维方法，并能将其运用于日常生活与健康相关活动中。 2. 理解并掌握中医基础理论中的基本概念与理论，如藏象、气血、经络、病因、病机、治则等，并能用来解释一般的生命现象。 3. 正确认识中医的疾病观，能运用邪正盛衰、阴阳失调、气血失常理论来解释基本的发病原理，并能指出疾病过程中寒热转化、虚实转化的具体规律。  4. 理解中医治疗疾病的基本原则，并能解释“三因制宜”的运用原理。
syllabus: 中医学导论；中医哲学思想(元气论、阴阳理论、五行理论)；藏象；气血津液；经络；病因与发病；病机；预防与治疗

title: Anatomy
description: The aim of this course is to provide students with a basic knowledge of human topographical anatomy with particular emphasis on those aspects of special significance in Chinese Medicine, including Acupuncture, Tui-na and Orthopaedics and Traumatology in Chinese Medicine. The course will run concurrently with that in physiology and the syllabus will be integrated so that students will be able to correlate structure and function.
outcome: By the end of the course, students are able to:  1. Familiarize with the general organization of the organs in the body and how they organize to form a functional system.  2. Learn the importance of the structural relationship and arrangement in the clinical setting.  3. Be able to describe both the macroscopic and microscopic structures of the organs, and relate them to the functions of the organs.透過學習本課程，學生冀能：1. 熟悉人體內部結構及這些結構如何組成人體功能系統；2. 描述人體各器官的宏觀與微觀結構，並能聯系這些結構與功能的關係；3. 熟悉人體結構的臨床意義。透过学习本课程，学生冀能：1. 熟悉人体内部结构及这些结构如何组成人体功能系统；2. 描述人体各器官的宏观与微观结构，并能联系这些结构与功能的关系；3. 熟悉人体结构的临床意义。

title: Fundamental Physiology I
requirements: For BCME Majors only.
description: This course will cover the general physiology of humans, with an objective of enhancing thestudents' knowledge and understanding of how the body adapts physiologically to internal and external environmental changes. Topics include the physiological principles of normal cells, tissues and systems of the body. Comparisons with the concepts in Chinese medicine will be highlighted.
outcome: By the end of the course, students will be able to: 1. Understand the electrical properties of a neuron and understand the physiological significance of conduction of nerve impulse. 2. Recognize how a skeletal muscle contracts and recall the importance of neuromuscular transmission in a human body. 3. Describe with examples how homeostasis helps maintain physiological functions such as thermoregulation. 4. Discuss how the cardiovascular system helps regulate blood perfusion in body tissues. 5. Summarize how some of the altered functions in the cardiovascular and pulmonary systems affect the body. 6. Explain how the pulmonary system and blood transport oxygen to tissues and carbon dioxide from the tissues. 7. Summarize the roles of blood in hemostasis and immune defense.

title: Fundamental Physiology II
requirements: For BCME Majors only.
description: This course is a continuation of BCME1600.
outcome: By the end of the course, students will be able to: 1. Explain the processes by how the kidneys regulate the body fluid volume and its composition. 2. Summarize how the gastrointestinal system carries out the digestion and absorption of ingested food. 3. Outline the roles of various hormones and understand the mechanisms of their secretions. 4. Recall the organization of the nervous system and state how autonomic nervous system affects body functions. 5. Explain how the special senses particularly those in the eyes and ears function in human. 6. Outline how some of the altered functions in the kidneys, gastrointestinal, endocrine, and central nervous system affect the body. 7. Summarize the general principles on how the tissues and organs work altogether to maintain homeostasis.

title: Methodologies of Diagnosis in Chinese Medicine
requirements: For BCM Majors only; Prerequisite: BCME1205.
description: Methodologies of Diagnosis in Chinese Medicine is a subject about the fundamental theories, basic knowledge and skills concerning how to collect clinical information, diagnose diseases and differentiate patterns based on the basic theories of Chinese medicine. This module acts as a bridge linking the fundamental theories and various clinical subjects in Chinese medicine, and thus remains as one of the key components within the framework of Chinese medicine’s specialties. Through the studies of this course, the students will be able to master the basic theories, fundamental knowledge and skills concerning the four diagnostic methods in Chinese medicine including observation, olfaction and auscultation, inquiring and palpation. Upon the completion of the course, the students will be capable of making clinical diagnosis using common pattern differentiation methods encompassing eight rubrics, etiology & qi, blood and body fluids, visceral differentiations. In addition, the students will be familiar with six channels differentiation, wei-qi-ying-xue differentiation, sanjiao differentiation and meridian differentiation methods. Emphasis will be placed on the training students’ practical skills in four diagnostic methods, differentiating clinical patterns and writing clinical case notes, so that the course will lay a solid foundation for future studies of clinical subjects. The module Basic Concepts in Chinese Medicine is a pre-requisite for this course.
outcome: 完成本課程後，學生們將能達到以下的學習成果： （一）知識方面： 1. 掌握中醫診斷學常見的概念；掌握中醫診斷的基本原則；熟悉中醫診斷的基本原理、主要內容。 2. 掌握得神、失神、假神、常色的和病色的特徵及其臨床意義；熟悉常見異常形體、姿態的表現，色澤變化及五色所主病證。 3. 掌握正常舌象的表現，異常舌象的表現及其一般臨床意義；熟悉舌的結構。 4. 掌握咳嗽、哮、喘、呃逆、噯氣、噴嚏、譫語等變化及其一般臨床意義；以及病理性氣味等變化及其臨床意義。 5. 掌握問診的內容，常見現在症的內容；熟悉問診注意事項。 6. 掌握寸口脈診的方法，正常脈象的特徵，常見脈象的特徵與臨床意義，相兼脈的結合與主病規律；熟悉脈診的原理及診脈的意義，脈象的生理變異，以及診婦人脈、診小兒脈的特殊性。 7. 熟悉按診的意義。 8. 掌握八綱辨證的概念 ，各綱證候的概念、一般證候表現及臨床類型； 9. 掌握病因、氣血津液辨證的概念、各自包括的證候；熟悉病因病性的意義；  10. 掌握各臟腑的病變範圍和病機特點，及各臟腑常見證的含義、臨床表現和病機； 11. 熟悉六經辨證、衛氣營血辨證、三焦辨證、經絡辨證的基本知識和方法； 12. 掌握中醫病案書寫通則。   （二）專業技能方面： 1. 掌握望神的具體步驟和能夠判斷常見異常形體、姿態的表現； 2. 掌握舌診的方法，能夠識別臨床常見的病理性舌象；  3. 能夠判斷呼吸、語言、嘔吐等聲音的高低、強弱、清濁以及病理氣味等變化；  4. 能夠運用問診方法進行病情資料的收集； 5. 掌握寸口脈診的方法，熟悉正常脈象及各種病理脈象的指下感覺特徵； 6. 掌握和熟練運用常用按診的手法； 7. 能夠運用八綱辨證對臨床病例進行辨證； 8. 能夠運用病因、氣血津液辨證對臨床病例進行辨證； 9. 能夠運用臟腑辨證對臨床典型病例進行辨證； 10. 能夠運用六經辨證、衛氣營血辨證、三焦辨證對臨床典型病例進行辨證； 11. 能夠按照常規格式書寫中醫門診病歷。  （三）共通能力方面 1. 增強溝通及人際技巧 2. 提高解難的分析力及判斷力  （四）態度/價值觀方面 1. 樹立追求更好和完善的人生態度。 2. 增強追求更精確的科學態度。
syllabus: 1. 緒論 中醫診斷的基本原則; 中醫“診斷”、“診法”、“辨病”、“辨證”、“病案”、“證”、“病”、“症”等概念; 中醫診斷的基本原理; 中醫診斷的發展概況。  2. 望診 整體望診之得神、失神、假神、常色的和病色的特徵及其臨床意義; 常見異常形體、姿態的表現，色澤變化及五色所主病證; 局部望診之望形體、望姿態、望頭面五官、望肢體皮膚、望二陰、望排出物、望小兒指紋的基本內容。  3. 舌診 舌診的方法，正常舌象的表現，異常舌象（病理舌色、舌形、舌態、和舌苔）的表現及其一般臨床意義; 臨床常見的舌象及主病; 舌的結構，舌診原理; 舌診的現代研究進展。  4. 聞診 咳嗽、哮、喘、呃逆、噯氣、噴嚏、譫語等變化及其一般臨床意義; 呼吸、語言、嘔吐等聲音的高低、強弱、清濁等變化的一般臨床意義; 口氣、汗、痰、二便、帶下以及病室氣味等變化及其臨床意義。  5. 問診 問診的內容，包括《十問歌》，常見現在症的內容; 問診的方法及注意事項，常見現在症的表現及其臨床意義; 問診在中醫診斷中的意義。  6. 脈診 寸口脈診的方法，正常脈象的特徵，常見脈象（浮、沉、遲、數、實、洪、細、弦、緊、滑、澀、濡、緩、弱、微、促、結、代）的特徵與臨床意義，相兼脈的結合與主病規律;　脈診的原理及診脈的意義，脈象的生理變異，長、短、芤、革、牢、伏、散、動、疾脈的特徵和臨床意義，診婦人脈、診小兒脈的特殊性; 遍診法、三部診法的診脈部位，真臟脈特徵的臨床意義，脈診的研究進展。  7. 按診 按診的方法，按脘腹的內容及意義; 按診的意義，按胸脅、按肌膚、按手足、按腧穴的內容與意義; 按診的現代研究進展。  8. 八綱辨證 八綱辨證的概念；八綱各綱證候的概念、一般證候表現及臨床類型; 表證與裏證、寒證與熱證的鑒別要點，虛證與實證各自包括的內容；陽虛證、陰虛證、亡陽證、亡陰證的概念與證候表現; 八綱之間的相兼、錯雜、真假、轉化關係；八綱辨證的意義; 八綱辨證的發展情況。  9. 病因、氣血津液辨證 病因、氣血津液辨證的概念、各自包括的證候; 風、寒、暑、濕、燥、熱（實火）、毒、膿、食積、蟲積、氣虛、血虛、氣滯、血瘀，痰、飲、水停、津液虧虛等證的含義與證候表現; 病因病性的意義; 病因與氣血津液辨證各證的常見證名，各證之間的兼併、因果關係。  10. 臟腑辨證 各臟腑的病變範圍和病機特點，掌握各臟腑常見證的含義、臨床表現和病機; 臟腑辨證的概念、基本方法、意義及運用範圍; 臟腑之間的發病關係。  11. 其他辨證方法 簡介六經辨證、衛氣營血辨證、三焦辨證、經絡辨證的基本知識及六經、衛氣營血、三焦病證的傳變關係。  12. 診法與辨證運用 辨證的基本內容與具體要求; 病情資料的綜合處理，辨證思維的方法; 辨證的步驟，辨證與診法的關係。  13. 疾病診斷概論 “病”的概念，病、證、症之間的關係; 疾病診斷及辨病與辨證相結合的意義; 疾病的命名形式，疾病分類的方法。  14. 中醫病案書寫 中醫病案書寫通則; 病案書寫的意義、內容、格式; 病案書寫的沿革。
recommended_readings: 教材： 中醫診斷學。朱文鋒主編。普通高等教育中醫藥類規劃教材，第六版，上海科學技術出版社。 參考教材： 1. 中醫診斷學。朱文鋒主編。中醫藥學高級叢書，人民衛生出版社，1999。  2. 望診彩色圖譜。鄧中炎，羅益寬編著。三聯書店（香港）有限公司，1990。 3. 實用中醫舌診彩色圖譜。宋天彬著。安徽科學技術出版社，1994。 4. 中醫舌診知識。辛瑛主編。人民衛生出版社，1996。 5. 中華脈診。劉冠軍著。中國中醫藥出版社，2002。 6. 中醫辨脈症治。向宗瑄主編。中國中醫藥出版社，1998。 7. 瀕湖脈學白話解。北京中醫藥大學中醫基礎教研室編，1999. 8. 中醫診斷學。鄧鐵濤主編。上海科學技術出版社，1984。 9. 中醫辨證學。柯雪帆主編。上海中醫學院出版社，1987。

title: Selected Reading in Chinese Medicine Classics - Nei-Jing
requirements: For BCME Majors only.
description: Huang-Di-Nei-Jing (The Yellow Emperor’s Medicine Classic) is the earliest Chinese medical writing among those which are available today. It is the foundation of the theories of Chinese medicine and throughout the years, developments of Chinese medicine were based on Nei-Jing. This course elaborates on the origin of Nei-Jing and explains it’s concepts on life and diseases. There will also be in depth study of selected passages of this medical classic.
outcome: １. 熟悉《內經》成書的不同說法，掌握不同方面的考證方法及其結果。 ２. 透過學習《內經》的宇宙生成和生命起源假說，掌握《內經》的大自然觀。 ３. 透過學習《內經》的疾病觀，掌握人與自然的關係和中醫學中的生理、病理和養生等方面的理論基礎。 ４. 透過研習《內經》部分篇章，掌握個別篇章的中心內容，並培養學生對其他篇章的自學能力。
syllabus: 《內經》的成書年代及沿革 介紹《內經》成書過程的不同說法，並從多方面（書目文獻、歷法、篇章內容等）考證其成書年代。  《內經》的生命觀 闡釋《內經》的宇宙生成和生命起源的假說。  《內經》的疾病觀 闡釋《內經》對疾病發生及發展的認識。  《素問》選讀 《上古天真論》、《四氣調神大論》、《生氣通天論》、《六節藏象論》、《陰陽應象大論》、《至真要大論》 《痹論》、《舉痛論》  《靈樞》選讀 《本神篇》、《決氣篇》
recommended_readings: １. 《黃帝內經詞典》（郭靄春主編）：天津科學技術出版社，1991年 ２. 《黃帝內經素問校注語釋》（郭靄春主編）：天津科學技術出版社，1989年 ３. 《內經選讀》（王洪圖主編）：上海科學技術出版社，1997年 ４. 《黃帝內經素問》（王冰版）：人民衛生出版社，1981年 ５. 《靈樞經》（史崧版）：人民衛生出版社，1981年

title: Fundamental Chinese Materia Medica
description: Fundamental Chinese Materia Medica is a course dealing with the medical properties and clinical applications of Chinese material medical. It is one of the fundamental courses of Chinese medicine. This course consists of two parts: The first part covers the theories of Chinese medical material and the second part is about the medical properties and applications of different medicines.The application of Chinese material medical is based on Chinese medicine theories, with particular emphasis on the pattern differentiation of Chinese medicine. Result of modern pharmaceutical research will also be introduced so as to provide basic knowledge about Chinese medicine research for the students. Besides lecture, other learning activities will also be included in this course, such as specimen observation, visiting Chinese material medical factory and processing Chinese medical material.
outcome: 完成本科目后，学生期望能够： 1. 了解中药的起源和中药学发展概况 2. 掌握中药性味、升降浮沉、归经、配伍、禁忌等基本理论和使用原则 3. 了解中药产地与药效的关系，及常用炮制方法及其作用原理 4. 掌握或熟悉300种左右常用中药(其中重点药物约195种，一般药物约100种)的分类、性味、归经、功效、主治、用法用量、使用注意及同类药性能比较
syllabus: 1. 总论；2. 解表药；3. 清热药；4. 温里药；5. 泻下药；6. 治风药；7. 袪湿药；8. 理气药；9. 理血药；10. 化痰止咳平喘药； 11. 补益药；12. 收涩药；13. 消食药(自学内容，不考核)；14. 安神药(自学内容，不考核)；15. 开窍药(自学内容，不考核)

title: Selected Reading in Chinese Medicine Classics - Shang-Han-Lun
requirements: For BCME Majors only.
description: As one of the most important classics in Chinese Medicine, Treatise on Exogenous Febrile Diseases (Shang Han Lun) focuses on the treatment of cold-attack disease and forms a recognition system with theory, therapy, formula and herbs, which is termed as theoretical system of treatment based on syndrome differentiation. Such thinking way and treatment system have played a great impact on the development of Chinese medicine in clinical treatment for thousands of years. By means of studying the original texts, students should learn to understand the method of syndrome differentiation, especially for the cold-attack disease and further to understand its important significance in clinical treatment, which will enable them to establish a solid foundation for the study of various clinical courses.
outcome: 學生在學習本課程之後，應能夠： 1、 認識傷寒病與六經辨證的基本意義； 2、 指出相關原文之古文字意義並能熟記一部分要求背誦之原文及相關的方劑組成與藥物特點； 3、 從病、證、方、藥各個方面説明所選讀之條文的醫學内容，並能將六經辨證方法運用於實際病例之中。
syllabus: 緒論 辨太陽病脈證並治 辨陽明病脈證並治 辨少陽病脈證並治 辨太陰病脈證並治 辨少陰病脈證並治 辨厥陰病脈證並治

title: Introduction to the Meridian System
requirements: For BCME Majors only.
description: This course is one of the main components of Acupuncture and Chinese medicine theory, which is also the basic concept of acupuncture. Based on the clinical theory, this course introduces some of the main acupuncture points and explains their clinical application, treatment and points’ location. It also emphases on the points’ clinical treatment technique. The course will also describe the causes and prevention methods of accidents commonly encountered in acupuncture.
outcome: 完成本課程後，期望學生能達到以下學習成果： 1. 掌握十四經絡的循行規律、分布、起止點；了解各經的病候及主治，並能辨識身體局部以及常見病症之所屬經絡。 2. 掌握十四經絡中重點穴位的定位、經絡、穴性、功效；了解腧穴解剖結構，基本操作方法及臨床應用，並能就常見證候選用合適穴位，分析作用原理及操作安全風險。 3. 掌握重點穴位的取穴方法，並能在同學身上準確點出常用腧穴的位置。 4. 能說明奇經八脈及其相關穴位的名稱及病候。 5. 能指出特定穴位的名稱和臨床應用。 6. 了解針灸操作過程的協作要求，並展現良好溝通技巧。
syllabus: 緒論 - 經絡腧穴總論 十四經穴各論 - 十四經絡的循行、病候，以及各經常用穴位之定位、穴性及功效 奇經八脈 - 奇經八脈的循行、病候，以及各經常用穴位之定位、穴性及功效 特定穴 - 特定穴的意義、配伍及應用 經外奇穴 - 常用經外奇穴的定位及主治  解剖工作坊 - 身體體表結構與腧穴的關係；人體解剖技巧操作。

title: Formulae of Chinese Medicine
description: Formulae of Chinese Medicine is a bridge subject from theory to clinical application, which focuses on the combination rules of various herbs. It will enable students to deepen the understanding of theories of Chinese medicine for the future clinical treatment.As one of the fundamental courses, it is to help students establish the right methods and thinking ways in learning formulae of Chinese medicine, with a solid knowledge of Chinese Materia Medica. title: Yi-Jing and Chinese Medicine
requirements: For BCM and MCM Majors only.
description: Chinese philosophy has a profound influence on the medical concepts. Through the study of Yi-Jing, students will learn the philosophical concepts behind many medical and medicinal theories.

title: Emergency Medicine in Chinese Medicine
requirements: For BCM and MCM Majors only.
description: Students are taught to deal with emergency situations in the setting of a Chinese medicine clinic. Basic knowledge of first aid is included in this course.

title: Empirical Identification of Chinese Herbal Drugs
requirements: For BCM and MCM Majors only.
description: This course teaches the identification and quality assessment of Chinese herbal drugs basing on empirical knowledge. Various types of Chinese herbal drugs will be covered, including common Chinese herbal drugs, Chinese herbal drugs which are often confused as well as expensive Chinese herbal drugs.

title: Fundamental Diagnostic Radiology
requirements: For BCM and MCM Majors only.
description: This course introduces radiology of the human body structure and organs and how the images facilitate the diagnosis of illnesses through better understanding of the anatomy, physiological functions and pathological changes of the human body. Topics include: diagnostic radiology, the theory of x-ray images, the concept of density and the applications on the respiratory system, the circulation system, the digestive system, the urological system and the musculo-skeletal system.

title: Five Movements and Six Qi
description: This course introduces the students about the basic concepts and theory of ‘Five-Movement and Six-Qi’ in Chinese medicine. This theory is used to explain and analyze the way to deals with the relationship between human being and climatic variations. The emphasis is placed on the climatic changes and their influence on the occurrence of diseases, in particular epidemic diseases.

title: A Comparative Study of the Traditional Chinese and Western Medical System
requirements: For BCM and MCM Majors only.
description: This course introduces to students the differences between traditional Chinese and Western Medical Systems by comparing their culture, history, scientific background, fundamental principles, treatment methods and present status. This course also looks into the differences between Chinese and Western drugs and their therapeutic applications.

title: Clinical Thinking Skills in Chinese Medicine
description: Clinical reasoning strategies are essential for proper diagnosis and appropriate treatment regimen in Chinese Medicine. In this course, students will learn and discuss how featured clinical reasoning skills of Chinese Medicine could be applied throughout the clinical process, from diagnosis to prescription of herbs, basing on the study of real clinical cases. By specifying the clinical reasoning strategies through the consolidation of the fundamental knowledge of Chinese Medicine, students shall be able to tackle the problems in the future clinical subjects by proper reasoning according to the principles and theories of Chinese Medicine.

title: Paediatric Tuina Therapy
description: Pediatric massage therapy is a clinical treatment in traditional Chinese Medicine that is specifically designed for children. It is non-invasive and also demonstrates good therapeutic efficacy on different common pediatric diseases. Since children have their unique physiological and pathological features, many of the acupuncture points like linear points and planar points applied is specific for children. The manual manipulation of pediatric massage therapy, including operating frequency and duration, is also different from that of adult massage therapy. The operation procedures must be light, soft and steady. Specific multiple-style manipulations may be required in addition to the conventional single-style manipulation for pediatric massage therapy. The objectives of the course are to appreciate the development and the features of the current clinical branches of pediatric massage therapy, and to understand the principles of the selection of acupuncture points and manual manipulation in different common pediatric diseases.

title: Classical Prescriptions and Medical Records
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: The course introduces classical prescriptions and medical records written by renowned Chinese Medicine Practitioners in Song, Yuan, Ming and Qing Dynasties. Students will analyze the logic and clinical application of the classical prescriptions and medical records, which will further enhance their learning in differential diagnosis.

title: Basic and Clinical Toxicology of Chinese Medicines
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: The main objective of this course is to enable the students to understand the concepts and mechanisms of toxicity and adverse effects of Chinese medicines. This course will introduce the basic principles and the history of toxicology of Chinese medicines, the toxic components of Chinese medicines, the mechanisms of toxicity of Chinese medicines, interaction between Chinese medicines and Western medicines, as well as the classification, management, clinical application, safety handling and adverse reaction and toxicity of Chinese medicines. This course is expected to equip students with the foundation of studying clinical safety use of Chinese medicines.

title: Clinical Training I
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: Clinical Training is an important step to enhance the clinical skill of Chinese medicine for students, which is essential for the education of Chinese medicine practitioner. Through clinical practice, students can enhance their clinical skill through collecting patients’ information by observation, auscultation & olfaction, interrogation, and palpation. Further, in these process, students can learn how to analyze the etiology and pathogenesis of disease, make TCM syndrome diagnosis, and have basic understanding of treatment, prevention and rehabilitation of common disease in various specialties of Chinese medicine, including internal medicine, surgery, gynecology, pediatric, acupuncture and bone setting. These trainings will help students to establish a good foundation for clinical practice in future.
outcome: 1.初步了解診所日常運作 2. 能說明中醫師常規診療步驟 3. 能展現應有的專業態度和操守 4. 能按規範運用四診方法 5. 能運用中醫理論分析四診搜集的資料，進行合理的病機分析
syllabus: 中醫診所日常運作 觀察中醫診療環境中各部門如前台、藥房、診室的運作及溝通。  中醫臨床常規診療步驟及規範 觀察醫師診證和實施治療的步驟、注意事項和操作規範。  中醫理論基礎 中醫的整體觀念、辨證論治、陰陽五行學說、病因病機學說、臟腑學說、經絡學說。  中醫診斷學 中醫的診法、各種辨證方法（八綱辨證、氣血津液辨證、病因辨證、臟腑辨證、衛氣營血辨證、三焦辨證、六經辨證和經絡辨證等）。

title: Internal Medicine I
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: “Internal Medicine” is the foundation of all other clinical courses. It is a bridge between the basic theoretical courses and the clinical courses of Chinese medicine. “Internal Medicine I” deals with the common diseases of the pulmonary system, the cardiovascular system, the digestive system, and the qi, blood and body fluid system. The symptoms, etiology, diagnosis and treatment of these diseases are discussed.
outcome: 完成本課程後，學生期望能夠： 1. 掌握常見內科疾病的病因病機及其臨床表現 2. 診斷及鑒別診斷常見內科疾病 3. 對常見內科疾病作辨證論治及處方用藥
syllabus: 闡述以下病證的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護 1.感冒 2.咳嗽 3.哮病 4.喘證 5.肺癰 6.肺癆 7.肺脹 8.肺痿 9.痰飲 10.心悸 11.心痛 12.不寐 13.汗證 14.血證 15.厥證 16.癎病 17.胃痛 18.痞滿 19.嘔吐 20.呃逆 21.噎嗝 22.腹痛
recommended_readings: 《中醫內科學》, 田德祿主編, 北京：人民衛生出版社, 2002 (七版內科教材和授課主要教材) 《中醫內科學》, 王永炎主編，上海：上海科學技術出版社，1997 (六版內科教材和授課參考教材) 《中醫內科學》, 張伯臾主編，上海：上海科學技術出版社，1985 (五版內科教材和授課參考教材)

title: Specialties in Chinese Medicine: Febrile Diseases
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: This course deals with the theories, treatment and prevention of ailments caused by exogenous factors (mostly infectious). Through the course, students will acquire knowledge of fever related diseases in different medical subjects by using the “four aspect pattern identification” and “triple burner pattern identification”.
outcome: 完成本課程後，期望學生能達到以下學習成果： 1. 描述溫病學說的基本歷史背景，以及衛氣營血辨證與三焦辨證的框架； 2. 熟悉要求背誦之溫病醫著原文、及其內容的意義，熟悉溫病特有方劑組成特點； 3. 識別所教授的各種溫病，並能描述其病因病機及治療方法； 4. 對溫病學的相關議題進行多角度分析。
syllabus: 基本理論 說明溫病的特點、病因病機、三焦及衛氣營血辨治體系，以及常用的診法、治療與預防。  病證診治 掌握溫病的成因及治療方案，如溫熱類、濕熱類溫病，風溫、春溫、暑溫、暑濕、濕溫等。  古文導讀 溫病學經典原著選讀，如《溫熱論》、《溫病條辨》等。
recommended_readings: 教科書： 1. 新世紀全國高等中醫藥院校七年制規劃教材·《溫病學》，楊進主編，中國中醫藥出版社，2004年版。ISBN： 7-80156-562-2/R·562。 2. 《溫病條辨》，清·吳鞠通著，北京：人民衛生出版社，2005年。   參考書： 一、古籍： 1. 《溫疫論》，明·吳又可著 2. 《溫熱論》、《三時伏氣外感篇》、《臨證指南醫案》，清·葉天士著 3. 《濕熱條辨》，清·薛生白著 4. 《溫病條辨》、《吳鞠通醫案》、《醫醫病書》，清·吳鞠通著 5. 《溫熱經緯》，清·王士雄著  二、現代書： 1. 《溫病條辨臨床學習參考》，南京中醫藥大學溫病教研室，楊進、王燦暉主編，北京：人民衛生出版社，2002年。ISBN：7-117-04963-4/R·4964 2. 《何叔平點評溫病條辨》，何叔平著，北京：人民軍醫出版社，2007年。ISBN：978-7-5091-1307-3

title: Selected Reading in Chinese Medicine Classics - Jin-Gui-Yao-Lue
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: This course teaches the medical classic named Jin-Gui-Yao-Lue. The main focus of the course is to analyze the major texts of this classic so as to enrich students’ knowledge for further medical diagnosis. Through the course, students will acquire a good command in analyzing examples of different diseases in Jin-Gui-Yao-Lue, and apply in clinical treatment.
outcome: 完成本課程後，學生應能： １. 描述《金匱要略》的成書背景、學術成就及價值； ２. 描述所教授疾病的發病規律及診治方法與藏腑經絡辨證的基本意義； ３. 熟記要求背誦之原文、相關古文字的意義，以及方劑組成與藥物特點； ４. 從病、證、方、藥各個方面理解所選讀之條文的醫學内容並進行合理的分析； ５. 搜索並理解《金匱要略》相關的文獻資料； ６. 對不同的學術觀點作比較、分析和評價，並闡述和討論有關內容。
syllabus: 總論 《金匱要略》的成書背景、學術價值和學習方法  臟腑經絡先後病脈證第一 辨治雜病的指導原則和方法，如治未病、臟腑經絡辨證方法等  痙濕暍病脈證治第二 痙病、濕病的病因、病機、治法和主要方藥配伍原理  血痹虛勞病脈證並治第六 血痹、虛勞病的病因、病機、治法和主要方藥配伍原理  肺痿肺癰咳嗽上氣病脈證治第七 肺痿、肺癰病的病因、病機、治法和主要方藥配伍原理  胸痹心痛短氣病脈證治第九 胸痹、心痛病的病因、病機、治法和主要方藥配伍原理  腹滿寒疝宿食病脈證治第十 腹滿、寒疝病的病因、病機、治法和主要方藥配伍原理  痰飲咳嗽病脈證並治第十二 痰飲病的病因、病機、治法和主要方藥配伍原理  黃疸病脈證並治第十五 黃疸病的病因、病機、治法和主要方藥配伍原理  婦人妊娠病脈證並治第二十 婦人妊娠諸病的病因、病機、治法和主要方藥配伍原理  婦人雜病脈證並治第二十二 婦人雜病的特點，和熱入血室、經水不利等病的病因、病機、治法和主要方藥配伍原理
recommended_readings: 教材︰ 范永升︰《金匱要略》新世紀(第二版)全國高等中醫藥院校規劃教材，北京︰中國中醫藥出版社 ISBN 978-7-80156-425-2  參考書目︰ 明‧趙以德 清‧周揚俊 《金匱玉函經二註》  清‧尤在涇 《金匱要略心典》  清‧魏荔彤 《金匱要略方論本義》  清‧喻昌《醫門法律》 清‧陳修圓《金匱要略淺注》 清‧徐忠可《金匱要略論注》 清‧程云來《金匱要略直解》  曹穎甫《金匱要略發微》  秦伯未《金匱簡釋》  金壽山《金匱詮釋》  程門雪 《金匱篇解》 陶葆蓀《陶葆蓀金匱要略探尋》 同學亦可瀏覽圖書館網頁，取得網上參考資料︰ http://libguides.lib.cuhk.edu.hk/c.php?g=262526&p=1753576

title: Specialties in Chinese Medicine: Obstetrics and Gynaecology
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: Gynecology of TCM is a clinical specialty and concentrates on studying the physiological and pathological characteristics, diagnostic and therapeutic principles and specific diseases related to women. We shall combine the class teaching and clinic teaching to let the students master the related knowledge about the treatment of the women diseases in menstruation, pregnancy, delivery and child-feeding.
outcome: 完成本課程後，期望學生能取得以下學習成果： 1. 掌握中醫婦科學的基本理論和基本知識。 2. 熟悉婦科臨床基本操作技能。 3. 掌握婦女特有的生理病理、保健預防、疾病診治的系統知識。 4. 掌握婦科疾病的特點和專用方劑。 5. 能運用中醫學理論診斷婦科病，以辨證論治原則處理臨床各類常見疾病。 6. 了解婦科常見病的研究進展及常用急救處理。
syllabus: 第一章 緒言 第一節 中醫婦科學的定義與範圍 中醫婦科學的定義和研究範圍。  第二節 中醫婦科學發展簡史 十大歷史時期中醫婦科學的代表性著作及其貢獻。  第二章 女性的生殖臟器 陰戶、玉門、陰道、子門、胞宮的解剖位置與功能。及現代盆腔解剖學知識  第三章 女性的生理特點 沖任督帶四脈的四個共同特點及與胞宮的聯系。臟腑與胞宮。  第一節 女性的生理基礎 天癸的生理基礎與作用。氣血對胞宮的生理作用。  第二節 女性的特殊生理 月經的生理現象、產生機理；月經產生機理的臨床意義。經帶胎產乳的生理現象及產生機理。  第四章 女性的病理特點 第一節 病因 重點講述四大病因及其致病特點：淫邪因素、情志因素、生活因素、體質因素。  第二節 病機 臟腑功能失常，氣血失調，沖任督帶損傷及腎-天癸-沖任-胞宮軸失調。  第五章 婦科疾病的診斷要點 第一節 四診要點 首重問診：年齡、主訴、現病史、月經史、帶下、既往史、家族史、個人生活史。結合望、聞、切診：結合婦女的生理病理特點。  第二節 辨證要點與常見證型  第六章 婦科疾病的治療  常用內治法：補腎滋腎、疏肝養肝、健脾和胃、調理氣血。婦科主要外治法及外治的使用原則、常用外用藥物。婦科主要外治法：薰洗法、沖洗法、納藥法、貼敷法。  第七章 預防與保健  第八章 月經病 概述 -月經病的定義、範圍、主要病機、治則與宜忌。  第一至第六節 月經不調 月經先期、月經過多、經期延長 因三病病因病機相似，故以比較的形式一起講述。分別闡述其定義及病因病機的異同點和發病特點，診斷及鑒別診斷，結合月經的期量色質的辨證要點、及進行同一病機下不同證型間證治的比較，並舉臨床病例佐證。  月經後期、月經過少 定義及概述、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷。 辨證論治：腎虛、血虛、血寒、氣滯、痰濕各型的證、治、方、藥及相互比較，結合病案討論。  月經先後無定期 定義及概述、病因病機 診斷，與崩漏的鑒別診斷、及辨證論治。 辨證論治：腎虛、脾虛、肝鬱各型的證、治、方、藥。  總結月經不調六病的證治特點  第七節 經間期出血 定義及概述。 重點講述經間期氣血陰陽的變化規律，從而闡明其病因病機特點。診斷要點，與月經先期、赤帶的鑒別診斷。 腎陰虛、脾氣虛、濕熱、血瘀各型的證、治、方、藥。  第八節 崩漏 崩漏的定義及概述。 病因病機：腎虛、脾虛、血熱、血瘀。 診斷，與月經先期、月經先後無定期、月經過多、經期延長、經間期出血、異位妊娠、胎漏、墮胎、小產的鑒別診斷。治崩三法：塞流、澄源、復舊。 腎虛、脾虛、血熱、血瘀各型的證、治、方、藥。 附：急症處理  第九節 閉經 定義及概述。 病因病機：腎虛、脾虛、血虛、氣滯血瘀、寒凝血瘀、痰濕阻滯。診斷及鑒別診斷。 辨證論治：證、治、方、藥及治療注意點。  第十節 痛經 痛經定義及概述。病因病機、診斷。 與異位妊娠、胎動不安及婦科其他急腹症的鑒別診斷。 辨證論治及急證處理方法  第十一節 經行諸症 經行乳房脹痛、經行頭痛、經行身痛、 經行泄瀉、 經行情志異常。經行發熱、經行浮腫、經行情志異常、經行吐衄 各病的定義及概述、病因病機、診斷及辨證論治  第二十二節 經斷前後諸證 經斷前後諸證的定義及概述。病因病機：腎陰虛、腎陽虛。 診斷。辨證論治及現代研究進展，突出中醫治療特色。  第二十三節 經斷複來  第九章 帶下病 帶下病的定義及概述。病因病機：脾陽虛、腎陽虛、 陰虛挾濕、濕熱下注、濕毒蘊結。 診斷，與白濁、白淫、漏下、經間期出血的鑒別診斷。 辨證論治： 證治方藥及外治法。  第十章 妊娠病 妊娠病的定義。範圍：常見妊娠病。主要發病機理。 治則與宜忌。討論妊娠禁忌藥。  第一節 妊娠惡阻 定義及概述。病因病機：胃虛、肝熱、痰滯。 診斷，與妊娠合併內外科疾病所致嘔吐的鑒別診斷。 辨證論治及嘔吐重症的處理。  第二節 妊娠腹痛 妊娠腹痛的定義及概述。病因病機：血虛、虛寒、氣鬱。 診斷，與異位妊娠、胎動不安、妊娠合併急性闌尾炎、妊娠合併卵巢囊腫瘤蒂扭轉的鑒別診斷。 辨證論治：證、治、方、藥。  第三節 異位妊娠 異位妊娠的定義及概述。診斷及與腸癰、腸覃、妊娠腹痛、石淋（輸尿管結石）的鑒別診斷。 辨證論治：未破損期、已破損期各型的證、治、方、藥及急救處理，研究進展。  第四節 胎漏、 胎動不安 定義的聯系及區別。病因病機：腎虛、氣虛、血熱。 診斷，與激經、胎墮難留、胎死不下妊娠腹痛、宮外孕、鬼胎的鑒別診斷。辨證論治：中醫治療的特色和優勢分析。  第六節 滑胎 滑胎的定義及概述。  中西病因病機：診斷、辨證論治及強調預培其損   第七節 墮胎 小產 定義及概述。胎元已殞與未殞的鑒別及處理原則。  第八節 胎死不下  第九節 胎萎不長 病因病機：腎氣虧損、氣血虛弱、陰虛血熱。 診斷，與胎動不安的鑒別診斷。 辨證論治：腎氣虧損、氣血虛弱、陰虛血熱各型的證、治、方、藥。  第十節 鬼胎 第十一節 胎氣上逆  第十二節 胎水腫滿(子滿) 胎水腫滿的定義及概述。簡述病因病機：診斷與鑒別診斷。 辨證論治：脾氣虛弱、氣滯濕鬱各型的證、治、方、藥。  第十三節 妊娠腫脹 妊娠腫脹的定義及概述。 病因病機及辨證論治  第十四節 妊娠心煩  第十五節 妊娠眩暈 妊娠癇證 妊娠眩暈的定義及相互關系。病因病機及診斷、中醫治療。 重症的急救處理  第十七節 妊娠咳嗽 第十八節 妊娠失音  第十九節 妊娠小便淋痛 妊娠小便淋痛的定義及概述。 病因病機：陰虛津虧、心火偏亢、下焦濕熱。 診斷。辨證論治：陰虛津汙、心火偏亢、下焦濕熱各型的證、治、方、藥。  第十二章 產後病 產後病的定義。範圍：常見產後病，“產後三病”。 主要發病機理。特殊診斷，“產後三審”。 治療原則及論治規律。  第一節 產後血暈 產後血暈的定義及概述。病因病機：血虛氣脫、血瘀氣逆。 診斷，與產後子癇的鑒別診斷。辨證論治及急救處理  第二節 產後血崩  第三節 產後腹痛 產後腹痛的定義及概述。病因病機：血虛、血瘀。 診斷及辨證論治。  第四節 產後痙證 產後痙證的定義。病因病機及辨證論治、急救處理。  第五節 產後發熱 定義及概述。病因病機：感染邪毒、外感、血虛、血瘀。 診斷，與乳癰、產後小便淋痛的鑒別診斷。 辨證論治及介紹中醫治療特色  第六節 產後身痛 定義。病因病機：血虛、血瘀、外感。 診斷，與痹證的鑒別診斷。 辨證論治：血虛、血瘀、外感各型的證、治、方、藥。  第七節 惡露不絕 定義及概述。病因病機：氣虛、血熱、血瘀。 與月經不調病機比較。診斷及辨證論治  第八節 產後小便不通 第九節 產後小便頻數與失禁 病因及中醫治療  第十節 產後大便難  第十一節 缺乳、 乳汁自出 （附：回乳） 比較二者的病機特點及證治要點 常用中醫回乳方法  第十三章 婦科雜病 婦科雜病的定義。 範圍：常見婦科雜病。主要機理。論治要點。  第一節 不孕症 定義及概述。 病因病機：腎虛、肝鬱、痰濕、血瘀。及西醫病因 診斷及特殊檢查方法。辨證論治及研究進展。  第二節 子宮脫垂 定義及概述。病因病機、診斷。辨證論治  第三節 婦人腹痛 定義及概述。病因病機。診斷，與宮外孕、腸癰的鑒別診斷。辨證論治及中醫綜合療法、研究進展。  第四節 癥瘕 癥瘕的定義及概述。病因病機：氣滯、血瘀、痰濕、毒熱。 診斷，與妊娠、癃閉的鑒別診斷。中西治療及手術指征。  第五節 臟躁  第二節 陰腫 -定義及概述。病因病機：濕熱、寒濕。 第三節 陰瘡 -診斷，與梅毒、軟下疳、狐惑病的鑒別診斷。辨證論治及外治法。

title: Acupuncture
requirements: Prerequisites: BCME1206 and 2204.
description: Based on the knowledge of meridian and acu-points, this course intends to link principles of Chinese medicine and acupuncture with clinical practice. It will include topics such as syndrome differentiation and treatment of acupuncture in relevant diseases, setting therapeutic methods, prescription of acu-points, therapeutic techniques etc. Through this course, students will acquire basic knowledge and skills of acupuncture in clinical techniques, differentiation of important acu-points, principle of prescription, selection of tools and their application in common or urgent cases. Prerequisite:BCM1206, BCM2204.
outcome: 完成本課程後，期望學生能達到以下學習成果： 1. 掌握課堂範圍內各類常見疾病的辨證特點、規律和方法，並能就常見病例分析，說明病因病機、辨證分型、治療原則及治療方法，擬定針灸處方，並說明其方義； 2. 掌握各類刺灸操作的基本要求、適應證、禁忌證、操作方法及注意事項，並能選擇適應於病證的治療針具、準確實施操作手法，以及常見意外處理方法； 3. 了解針灸操作過程的協作要求，並展現良好溝通技巧。
syllabus: 緒論 - 說明針灸起源、發展沿革、學術流派和學術發展趨勢。  治療學總論 - 介紹針灸治療取得療效的四個關鍵、治療作用和治療原理。  刺灸法 - 毫針的基本操作及補瀉手法(單式手法如迎隨、呼吸、開合、疾徐補瀉法，及複式手法)、艾灸法、皮膚針、三棱針、頭針(四區十四線)、耳針、溫針、電針、火罐的適應證、禁忌證、操作方法、及注意事項。 常見針灸意外的處理和預防方法。  治療學 - 以下常見病証的病因病機、辨證分型、治療原則與方法等。 內科：中風及合併症、頭痛、眩暈、面癱、面痛、痿證、痹證 (腰椎間盤突出症、肩周炎、頸椎病、膝關節痛)、感冒、哮喘、胃脘痛、鬱症、脅痛、胸痹、不寐、神昏、抽搐等 婦科：痛經、閉經 兒科：驚風、腦癱 五官：耳嗚、耳聾、鼻淵 皮膚：蛇串瘡、癮疹、痄腮、痔瘡等  導修 - 示範，指導及討論不同刺灸手法的適應證、操作法、禁忌症和注意事項。  個案討論 - 透過接觸真實病人或討論書面案例，讓學生參與針灸治療從辨證到施治的思路全程。  網上教學 - 於網上教學平台設置課堂講義及多媒體課件，讓同學可重溫課堂重點，方便複習。
recommended_readings: 教材 1. 針灸學(王華、杜元灝主編)：全國高等中醫藥院校規劃教材(第九版)。中國中醫藥出版社，2012年  (或其他版本教材)  參考書目  2. 針灸大成 (明．楊繼洲著)：天津科技出版社，2003年。  3. 針灸臨證指要 (孫外主著)：商務印書局(香港)有限公司出版，2005年。

title: Massage Therapy in Chinese Medicine
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: Massage therapy is a kind of external treatment in clinical Chinese Medicine. It is a therapeutic approach guided by the theory of traditional Chinese Medicine and used to treat diseases through massage manipulations to certain parts or points on the human body surface. Students will acquire the knowledge of different types of manipulations so as to cure common diseases. Students have to practise so as to work effectively in clinical treatment.
outcome: 完成本課程後，期望學生能達到以下學習成果： 1. 瞭解推拿學的理論體系 2. 掌握《易筋洗髓經》、《八段錦》、《韋陀勁》、《五禽戲》、《太極拳》等部分功法的鍛煉技巧 3. 掌握一指禪推法、滾法等常用手法 4. 掌握各種常見病的治療方法 5. 掌握不同流派的特色治療手法
syllabus: 推拿學概論 - 推拿學的淵源,特點,原理,治則,醫師自護 推拿功法學 - 練功方法 推拿手法學 - 推拿手法的鍛煉方法 常見病治療 - 常見病的治療思路與方法
recommended_readings: 《推拿學》高等中醫藥院校教材，俞大方主編，上海科學技術出版社，1985

title: Surgery and Topical Diseases
requirements: For BCM and MCM Majors only; Prerequisites: BCME1205, 2001, 2101 and 2201.
description: “Surgery and Topical Diseases in Chinese Medicine” is one of the main clinical subjects and plays an important role in Chinese medicine. It is an art of healing using combined surgical and pharmacological approaches to treat many surgical and topical diseases under the holistic theories of Chinese medicine. This course will emphasize on the clinical diagnosis, treatment methods and surgical techniques used in Chinese medicine for the management of the common topical diseases. This course will provide a basis for the students to further their clinical, teaching or researching careers in Chinese medicine, and is the foundation for the students to become specialists in topical diseases. The courses of “Basic Concepts in Chinese Medicine”, “Methodologies of Diagnosis in Chinese Medicine”, “Principles of Chinese Medicines Application” and “Principles of Prescription in Chinese Medicine” are the prerequisites for this course.
outcome: 完成本科目，期望學生能達到以下的學習成果： 1. 瞭解中醫外科學的發展概況、範圍、疾病命名及基本術語。 2. 掌握中醫外科學的致病因素與發病機理。 3. 掌握外科常見病的辨證論治方法和規律。 4. 掌握外科常見病的預防與調護方法。 5. 掌握中醫外科疾病的主要內治法及外治法。 6. 掌握中醫外科疾病的操作技能以及急症的處理原則。 7. 熟練掌握臨床各章常見疾病（包括瘡瘍、乳房疾病、癭、瘤、岩、皮膚及性傳播疾病、肛門直腸疾病、泌尿男性疾病、周圍血管疾病及其他外科疾病）的診斷要點、鑒別診斷和辨證論治方法。 8. 使學生們對中醫外科學產生興趣及建立對外科疾病的診療的信心。 9. 擁有繼續學習中醫外科學的基礎及能力。
syllabus: 中醫外科學發展概況 中醫外科學的起源、形成、發展、成熟；歷代外科學的主要成就、著述和創造發明；中醫外科學術流派的主要學術思想和代表著作。  中醫外科學範圍、疾病命名及基本術語 中醫外科學範圍；外科疾病的命名規律，命名方法及基本術語。  中醫外科疾病的病因病機 外科疾病的常見病因和發病機理。  中醫外科疾病辨證 辨病原則及程式；陰陽辨證；部位辨證；經絡辨證；局部辨證包括腫、腫塊、結節、疼痛、瘙癢、麻木、膿、潰瘍和出血的辨證檢查方法。  中醫外科疾病治法 消 托 補三大內治法；外治法包括藥物療法、手術療法及其他療法。  中醫外科調護 一般護理和飲食護理的基本內容。   瘡瘍 瘡瘍的定義、病因病機、分期轉歸及辨證論治；常見疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，常見疾病包括：癤（有頭癤、無頭癤、癤病）、疔（顔面部疔瘡、手足部疔瘡、紅絲疔、爛疔、疫疔）、癰（頸癰、腋癰、胯腹癰、委中癰、臍癰）、發（鎖喉癰、臀癰、手發背、足發背）、有頭疽、流注、丹毒、無頭疽（附骨疽、環跳疽）、走黃、內陷、流痰、瘰癧。  乳房疾病 乳房疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，如乳癰、乳癆、乳漏、乳癖、乳癧、乳衄、乳岩。  癭 氣癭、肉癭、石癭的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治。  瘤、岩 血瘤、脂瘤、繭唇、失榮、腎岩的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治。  皮膚及性傳播疾病 皮膚及性傳播疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，如熱瘡、蛇串瘡、疣（尋常疣、扁平疣、傳染性軟疣）、風熱瘡、黃水瘡、癬、蟲咬皮炎、疥瘡、濕瘡、接觸性皮炎、藥毒、風瘙癢、癮疹、牛皮癬、貓眼瘡、白疕、白駁風、黧黑斑、粉刺、面遊風、酒齇鼻、油風、瓜藤纏、紅蝴蝶瘡、淋病、梅毒、尖銳濕疣、生殖器皰疹、愛滋病。   肛門直腸疾病 肛門直腸疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，如痔（內痔、外痔、混合痔）、息肉痔、肛隱窩炎、肛癰、肛漏、肛裂、脫肛、鎖肛痔。  泌尿男性疾病 泌尿男性疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，如慢性前列腺炎、前列腺增生症。  周圍血管疾病 周圍血管疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，如股腫、脫疽。  其他外科疾病 凍傷、燒傷、毒蛇咬傷、腸癰的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治。

title: Internal Medicine II
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: “Internal Medicine” is the foundation of all other clinical courses. It is a bridge between the basic theoretical courses and the clinical courses of Chinese medicine. “Internal Medicine II” deals with the common diseases of the digestive, liver and gallbladder, neurological, endocrine, urinary, Qi and blood, extremities and meridian systems. The symptoms, etiology, diagnosis and treatment of these diseases are discussed.
outcome: 完成本課程後，學生期望能夠： 1. 掌握常見內科疾病的病因病機及其臨床表現 2. 診斷及鑒別診斷常見內科疾病 3. 對常見內科疾病作辨證論治及處方用藥
syllabus: 闡述以下病證的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護，包括: 1. 泄瀉 2. 痢疾 3. 脅痛 4. 黃疸 5. 積聚 6. 鼓脹 7. 便秘 8. 鬱病 9. 癭氣 10.痙證 11.腰痛 12.虛勞 13.頭痛 14.眩暈 15.中風 16.消渴 17.水腫 18.癌症 19.淋證 20.癃閉 21.痹病 22.痿病 23.遺精 24.耳鳴耳聾

title: Promotion and Maintenance of Health By Chinese Medicine
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: “Prevention is better than cure” is a main concept of traditional Chinese Medicine. This course focuses on the basic concepts and theories of promotion and maintenance of Health with Chinese medicine theory. It embraces different types of preventive medical theories so as to maintain the health of patients.
outcome: 本科是中醫臨床學科的基本科目，完成本課程後，期望學生能達到以下學習成果：  （一）知識方面： １. 掌握保健養生學的發展背景、基本概念及原則 ２. 掌握中國傳統醫學中不同的保健養生方法：精神養生；飲食養生；運動養生；環境與養生；起居作息與養生；睡眠養生；娛樂養生；浴身保健；保健針灸、按摩；因人養生、因時養生；體質養生；部位養生等。  （二）專業技能方面： 1. 能把不同的保健養生方法在臨床上靈活應用。 2. 能夠發掘前賢真知灼見及寶貴養生經驗。 3. 能夠對前人經驗的闡發加以提高。 4. 能夠將中醫養生智慧推廣給市民大眾。   （三） 共通能力方面：  1. 增強溝通及人際技巧。 2. 提高解難的分析力及判斷力。

title: Hong Kong Medical System
description: This course enables the senior Chinese medical students to recognize the current structures, functions and regulatory framework of the health care systems in Hong Kong. title: Clinical Orthopaedics and Traumatology in Chinese Medicine
description: This course covers the Chinese Medical theories and techniques in diagnosis and treatment of traumatic injuries such as muscular injury, bone fracture and joint dislocation.
outcome: 1. 掌握中医骨伤科常见伤病的发病原因、机理、和诊治原则； 2. 认识骨关节检查、手法整复、理筋手法、夹缚固定的基本操作
syllabus: 1. 骨折概论︰病因病理、分类、诊断要点、骨折的并发症、骨折的愈合过程、骨折的临床愈合标准和骨性愈合标准、影响骨折愈合的因素、骨折的急救、骨折的治疗、骨折畸形愈合 2. 骨折概论︰迟缓愈合、不愈合的处理原则、全身主要骨骼古今名称对照表;上肢骨折︰锁骨骨折、肱骨外科颈骨折、肱骨干骨折、肱骨髁上骨折、肱骨外髁骨折、肱骨内上髁骨折、尺骨鹰嘴骨折 3. 上肢骨折︰桡骨头骨折、尺骨上1/3骨折合并桡骨头脱位、桡、尺骨干双骨折、桡、尺骨干单骨折、桡骨下1/3骨折合并下桡尺关节脱位、桡骨下端骨折、腕舟骨骨折、掌骨骨折、指骨骨折;手法练习 4. 伤科学发展简史；损伤的分类、病因、病机; 辨证︰望诊、问诊、闻诊、切诊；治法︰内治法、外治法 5. 躯干骨折︰脊柱骨折和脱位、外伤性截瘫、骨盆骨折 6. 下肢骨折︰股骨颈骨折、股骨转子间骨折、股骨干骨折、股骨髁上骨折、股骨髁间骨折、髌骨骨折 7. 下肢骨折︰胫骨髁骨折、胫腓骨干骨折、踝部骨折脱位、距骨骨折、跟骨骨折、跖骨骨折、趾骨骨折；躯干骨折︰胸骨骨折、肋骨骨折 8. 脱位概论︰病因病理、分类、诊断要点、脱位的并发症、辨证论治；脱位︰颞颌关节脱位、肩关节脱位、肘关节脱位 、小儿桡骨头半脱位、月骨脱位 、掌指关节及指间关节脱位 9. 骨病 10. 外用药制备 11. 脱位︰髋关节脱位 、髌骨脱位 、膝关节脱位 、跖跗关节脱位 、跖趾关节及趾间关节脱位  12.伤筋概论︰病因病理、分类、诊断要点、伤筋的并发症、辨证论治 13. 颈部筋伤︰颈部扭挫伤、失枕、颈椎病;肩部伤筋︰肩部扭挫伤、肩关节周围炎；肘部伤筋︰冈上肌腱炎、肘部扭挫伤、肱骨外上髁炎 14. 髋部伤筋︰髋部扭挫伤、股骨头骨骺炎；膝部伤筋︰膝关节侧副韧带损伤、半月板损伤、膝交叉韧带损伤、膝关节外伤性滑膜炎、胫骨结节骨骺炎、髌骨劳损；足踝部伤筋︰踝关节扭挫伤、跟腱损伤、跟部滑囊炎、跟痛症、跖管综合征、[足母]外翻、平足症； 15. 腕部伤筋︰腕部扭挫伤、桡侧伸腕肌腱周围炎、腕三角软骨损伤、腱鞘囊肿、桡骨茎突腱鞘炎、腕管综合征；手指伤筋︰指间关节扭挫伤、伸指、屈指肌腱断裂、屈指肌腱腱鞘炎 16. 损伤内症 17. 腰部伤筋︰腰部扭挫伤、腰部劳损、腰椎间盘突出症、梨状肌综合征、腰椎椎管狭窄症

title: Diagnostic Laboratory Tests and Radiology
description: This course introduces diagnostic laboratory tests and radiology applied in the human body structure and organs, and how the laboratory tests and images results facilitate the diagnosis of illnesses through better understanding of the anatomy, physiological functions and pathological changes of the human body. Topics include: theory of laboratory tests and diagnostic radiology; the applications on the respiratory system, the circulation system, the digestive system, the nervous system, the urological system and the musculoskeletal system; the applications on common lab tests, lab tests of metabolic disease, infectious disease and cancer.
outcome: 隨着香港中醫院的成立，中西醫協作成為大趨勢。現代中醫不僅需要具備傳統的中醫診斷手段，也必須掌握現代醫學的診斷技術，例如﹕臨床化驗及醫學影像學。本科目可讓中醫學生掌握診斷臨床化驗和醫學影像學的知識。完成本科目後，學生將能﹕1.    描述及總結影像及化驗學於診斷常見疾病的應用 ;2.    掌握如何為病人轉介合適的檢查的知識; 及3.    應用化驗和影像結果於疾病診斷以提高療效。

title: Clinical Study I
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: Clinical Practice Training is an important part of the TCM teaching. Through clinical practice, the students may improve deep learning of basic theory, and enhance the clinical knowledge and skills. The clinical practice training will last for one year and a half. The students will go to different training sites by stages in mainland and Hong Kong, and receive clinical training on various specialties of Chinese medicine, including internal medicine, surgery, gynecology, pediatric, acupuncture, surgery, bone setting, ophthalmology and otolaryngology, and dermatology. The students are anticipated to have the ability to appropriately treat the common diseases after completing the training.
outcome: 畢業實習是教學的主要組成部份，是培養學生獨立分析問題、解決問題能力的科學思維方法，鞏固和提高所學 基礎理論、臨床知識和技能，對學生進行綜合訓練的重要階段。畢業實習要求學生德、智、體全面發展，系統掌握中醫基礎理論和中醫臨床診療技能，並具有一定的現代醫學知識。  學生於內地中醫院進行為期38週之全科實習訓練，科目包括：內科、婦科、兒科，針灸、骨傷科、外科、急診及中藥房等等，要求學生在實習中，通過臨床實踐，進一步加深對所學理論的理解，更加深入地掌握以下的知識和能力﹕ 1. 中醫學基礎理論和臨床醫學理論。 2. 中藥、方劑學基本理論知識。 3. 中醫臨床各科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、診療技術和急、重症的處理原則 4. 與中醫學有關的現代科學技術和現代醫學的基本知識。 5. 養成良好醫德醫風，關心病人疾苦，責任心強，不缺勤，不早退，完成全期實習培訓。
syllabus: 中醫內科 中醫內科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、診療技術和急、重症的處理原則。  中醫婦科  中醫婦科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、診療技術和急、重症的處理原則。  中醫兒科 中醫兒科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、診療技術和急、重症的處理原則。  中醫針灸科 中醫針灸科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、診療技術和急、重症的處理原則。  中醫骨傷科 中醫骨傷科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、診療技術和急、重症的處理原則。  中醫外科 中醫外科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、診療技術和急、重症的處理原則。  中醫眼科 中醫眼科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、診療技術 和急、重症的處理原則。  中醫耳鼻喉科 中醫耳鼻喉科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、診療 技術和急、重症的處理原則。  皮膚、肛腸科 中醫皮膚、肛腸科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、 診療技術和急、重症的處理原則。  推拿科 中醫推拿科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、診療技 術和急、重症的處理原則。  急診科 中醫急診科常見病証的臨床特點、辨證論治、診療技術和急、重症的處理原則。  藥房 中藥房的具體操作。

title: Clinical Study III
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: Clinical Practice Training is an important part of the TCM teaching. Through clinical practice, the students may improve deep learning of basic theory, and enhance the clinical knowledge and skills. The clinical practice training will last for one year and a half. The students will go to different training sites by stages in mainland and Hong Kong, and receive clinical training on various specialties of Chinese medicine, including internal medicine, surgery, gynecology, pediatric, acupuncture, surgery, bone setting, ophthalmology and otolaryngology, and dermatology. The students are anticipated to have the ability to appropriately treat the common diseases after completing the training.

title: Ear, Nose, Throat and Ophthalmology
requirements: For BCME and MCMED Majors only.
description: This course is one of the Chinese medicine clinical courses. It is divided into two parts, Ophthalmology and Ear, Nose and Throat (ENT). This course deals with the basic anatomy, physiology and common diseases of eyes, ear, nose and throat. It teaches the traditional theories, diagnosis and treatment of these ailments.

outcome: 完成本課程後，期望學生能取得以下學習成果： １. 掌握中醫兒科學的基本理論和基本知識。 ２. 熟悉兒科臨床基本操作技能。 ３. 掌握小兒生長發育、生理病理、保健預防、疾病診治的系統知識。 ４. 能運用中醫學理論認識兒科病的特點。 ５. 以辨證論治原則處理兒科臨床各類常見疾病。
syllabus: 兒科學基礎 - 中醫兒科學的概念，中醫兒科學與相關學科的聯繫和區別。  發展簡史 - 中醫兒科學在各個歷史時期的學術進展及取得的重要成就。    年齡分期 - 胎兒期、新生兒期、嬰兒期、幼兒期、學齡前期、學齡期、青春期的分期方法。 各年齡期的生理特點。 小兒年齡分期對兒童保健和兒科疾病診斷、治療、預防、護理工作的意義。  生長發育 1. 小兒體重、身長、頭圍、胸圍、囟門、牙齒、呼吸、脈搏、血壓生理常數及測定方法，體格發育指標的臨床意義。 2. 小兒智慧發育，包括感知發育、運動發育、語言發育、性格發育的主要指標及其臨床意義。 3. 變蒸學說的基本內容及其價值。  生理病因病理特點 1. 小兒生理特點、病因特點、病理特點的基本內容。 2. “稚陰稚陽”學說、“純陽”學說及其理論指導價值。 3. 對肺臟嬌嫩、脾常不足、腎常虛、心常有余、肝常有餘學說的正確認識和理解。 4. “易虛易實”、“易寒易熱”學說的臨床指導意義。  兒科診法 1. 兒科四診與成人相比較在應用中的特點。現代四診的擴充。 2. 望診、聞診、問診、切診操作技能，在兒科臨床應用的方法。 3. 常見四診診查結果的臨床意義。  1． 兒科選用治法的原則及常用治法在兒科應用的特點。 2． 兒科常用內治治法的功能、適應證候、選方示例。 3． 兒科常用藥物外治法的操作方法、適應病證、應用示例。 4． 推拿療法、針灸療法、燈火燋法、拔罐療法、割治療法等其他療法的兒科應用。  新生兒病 胎黃 1. 胎黃的概念。生理性胎黃與病理性胎黃的區別。 2. 胎黃診斷要點。 3. 胎稟濕蘊、脾虛的病因。濕熱、寒濕蘊鬱肝膽，久則氣滯瘀積的病機。 4. 胎黃辨證要點、治療原則。 5. 證治分類：濕熱鬱蒸證治以清熱利濕，寒濕阻滯證治以溫中化濕，氣滯瘀積證治以化瘀消積。胎黃動風證、胎黃虛脫證的辨證與治療。 6. 胎黃的預防與調護。  臍疾 - 臍濕、臍瘡、臍血、臍突的概念、病因病機、外治、內治方法、預防。  肺系病證 感冒 1． 小兒感冒的發病特點。 2． 冒受風邪、感受時邪的病因。風寒、風熱、暑濕、時邪犯表，肺衛失宣的病機。 3． 證治分類：主證風寒感冒證治以辛溫解表，風熱感冒證治以辛涼解表，暑邪感冒證治以清暑解表，時邪感冒證治以清熱解毒。 4． 小兒感冒兼夾證夾痰、夾驚、夾滯的產生機理及其辨證論治。  咳嗽 1． 咳嗽的概念，與西醫學病名的關係。 2． 咳嗽的兒科發病情況。 3． 風邪犯肺外因，肺脾虛弱內因。風寒、風熱犯肺，痰熱、痰濕蘊肺，肺氣、肺陰虧虛，導致肺失宣肅的病機。 4． 證治分類：外感咳嗽的風寒咳嗽證治以疏風散寒，宣肺止咳；風熱咳嗽證治以疏風解熱，宣肺止咳。內傷咳嗽的痰熱咳嗽證治以清肺化痰止咳；痰濕咳嗽證治以燥濕化痰止咳；氣虛咳嗽證治以健脾補肺，益氣化痰；陰虛咳嗽證治以養陰潤肺，兼清餘熱。  肺炎喘嗽 1． 概念，主證，兒科臨床發病情況。 2． 臨床診斷。 3． 冒受風邪的外因，正氣不足的內因。常證風寒、風熱、痰熱、毒熱閉肺，陰虛肺熱、肺脾氣虛，導致肺氣閉郁、宣肅失司的病機；變證心陽虛衰、邪陷厥陰的產生機理。肺炎喘嗽常證與變證的演變與轉化。 4． 證治分類：常證風寒閉肺證治以辛溫宣肺，化痰止咳；風熱閉肺證治以辛涼宣肺，清熱化痰；痰熱閉肺證治以清熱滌痰，開肺定喘；毒熱閉肺證治以清熱解毒，瀉肺開閉；陰虛肺熱證治以養陰清肺，潤肺止咳；肺脾氣虛證治以補肺健脾，益氣化痰。變證心陽虛衰證治以溫補心陽，救逆固脫；邪陷厥陰證治以平肝熄風，清心開竅。 5． 調護。  哮喘 1． 概念，發病情況。 2． 哮喘與肺炎喘嗽的鑒別診斷。 3． 肺、脾、腎功能失調，痰飲留伏的內因，與感受外邪、接觸異氣的外因和哮喘發病的關係。 4． 外邪、異氣引動伏痰，痰阻氣道，肺失肅降的發作期病機；肺脾氣虛、脾腎陽虛、肺腎陰虛的緩解期病機。哮喘寒、熱、虛、實病機的演變與轉化。 5． 證治分類：發作期寒性哮喘治以溫肺散寒，化痰定喘；熱性哮喘治以清肺滌痰，止咳平喘；外寒內熱證治以解表清裏，定喘止咳；肺實腎虛證治以瀉肺補腎，標本兼顧。緩解期肺脾氣虛證治以健脾益氣，補肺固表；脾腎陽虛證治以健脾溫腎，固攝納氣；肺腎陰虛證治以養陰清熱，補益肺腎。 6． 哮喘的預防與調護。  脾系病證 鵝口瘡  1． 鵝口瘡的概念，發病情況。 2． 胎熱內蘊，口腔不潔，感染穢毒之邪的病因。穢毒蘊結，心脾積熱，或虛火上浮，薰蒸口舌的病機。 3． 鵝口瘡實火、虛火辨證要點。 4． 證治分類：心脾積熱證治以清心瀉脾；虛火上浮證治以滋陰降火。 5． 鵝口瘡內治、外治、護理的配合使用。  口瘡 1． 口瘡的概念，發病情況。 2． 口瘡的診斷要點。 3． 風熱邪毒侵犯的病因。風熱內乘，心脾積熱上攻，或陰虛虛火上炎，薰蒸口舌的病機。 4． 口瘡實火、虛火辨證要點。 5． 證治分類：風熱乘脾證治以疏風散火，清熱解毒；心火上炎證治以清心涼血，瀉火解毒；虛火上浮證治以滋陰降火，引火歸元。 6． 口瘡內治、外治、護理的配合使用。  嘔吐 1． 嘔吐證的概念，嘔吐證和溢乳的區別，嘔吐證和其他疾病中出現嘔吐症狀的鑒別。 2． 嘔吐的食積、胃熱、胃寒、肝氣病因，胃氣上逆病機。 3． 嘔吐的實、虛，寒、熱辨證。 4． 證治分類：乳食積滯證治以消乳消食,和胃降逆；胃熱氣逆證治以清熱瀉火，和胃降逆；脾胃虛寒證治以溫中散寒，和胃降逆；肝氣犯胃證治以疏肝理氣，和胃降逆。 5． 嘔吐的其它治療。 6． 嘔吐的調護。  腹痛 1． 腹痛證的概念，腹痛證和其他疾病中出現腹痛症狀的鑒別。 2． 腹痛的中寒、傷食、脾寒、瘀滯病因，氣機壅滯病機。 3． 腹痛的寒、食、瘀，實、虛辨證。 4． 證治分類   泄瀉 1． 泄瀉的概念，兒科發病情況。 2． 泄瀉診斷要點。泄瀉與痢疾的鑒別診斷。 3． 感受外邪、傷於乳食、脾胃虛弱的病因。暴瀉濕熱內蘊、風寒客脾、乳食傷脾，久瀉脾虛失運、脾腎陽虛，又均引起脾濕不化、升降失司、合污下流的病機；變證氣陰兩傷、陰竭陽脫的產生機理。 4． 暴瀉濕熱、風寒、傷食辨證；久瀉脾、腎虧虛辨證；變證津傷氣耗、陰竭陽脫辨證。 5． 證治分類：常證濕熱瀉治以清腸解熱，化濕止瀉；風寒瀉治以疏風散寒，化濕和中；傷食瀉治以運脾和胃，消食化滯；脾虛瀉治以健脾益氣，助運止瀉；脾腎陽虛瀉治以溫補脾腎，固澀止瀉。變證氣陰兩傷證治以健脾益氣，酸甘斂陰；陰竭陽脫證治以挽陰回陽，救逆固脫。 6． 泄瀉的推拿、針灸、外治療法。 7． 泄瀉的調護。  厭食 1． 厭食的概念，發病情況。 2． 厭食診斷要點。 3． 餵養不當、他病傷脾、先天不足、暑濕薰蒸、情志失調的病因。脾運失健、脾胃 氣虛、脾胃陰虛，導致脾運胃納功能失職的病機。 4． 運化功能失健與脾胃氣陰虧虛的辨別，脾健貴在運的治療原則。 5． 證治分類：脾運失健證治以調和脾胃，運脾開胃；脾胃氣虛證治以健脾益氣，佐以助運；脾胃陰虛證治以滋脾養胃，佐以助運。 6． 厭食的飲食調護。  積滯 1． 積滯的概念，發病情況。 2． 積滯與厭食的鑒別診斷。 3． 乳食傷脾的病因。乳食不化，壅積胃腸，氣滯不行，或脾虛夾積的病機。 4． 食積實證與虛實夾雜證的證候鑒別。 5． 證治分類：乳食內積證治以消乳化食，和中導滯；脾虛夾積證治以健脾助運，消食化滯。  疳證 1． 疳證的概念，古今發病情況的差異。 2． 疳證診斷要點。疳證與厭食、積滯的鑒別診斷。 3． 餵養不當、疾病傷脾、稟賦不足的病因。脾胃損傷，生化乏源，氣血虧虛，病涉五臟的病機。 4． 疳證虛、實，輕、重，主證、兼證辨證要點。 5． 證治分類：疳氣證治以調脾健運；疳積證治以消積理脾；幹疳證治以補益氣血。兼證眼疳證治以養血柔肝，滋陰明目；口疳證治以清心瀉火，滋陰生津；疳腫脹證治以健脾溫陽，利水消腫。 6． 中藥成藥、推拿療法。 7． 調護要點。  心肝病證 驚風  1． 驚風的概念，急驚風、慢驚風分類，驚風八候，發病情況，與西醫學疾病的關係。 2． 急驚風四證及診斷要點，慢驚風診斷要點。癲癇與驚風的鑒別診斷。 3． 急驚風外感六淫、疫毒、驚恐病因，慢驚風久病正氣虧虛病因。急驚風熱、痰、驚、風的病機演變；慢驚風脾胃虛弱、脾腎陽衰、陰虛風動的病機。 4． 急驚風的熱、痰、風辨證，慢驚風的臟腑、陰陽辨證。 5． 急驚風的清熱、豁痰、鎮驚、熄風治則，慢驚風的補虛扶正、平熄內風治則。 6． 證治分類 7． 驚厥的急症搶救。 8． 驚風的預防與調護。  腎系病證 小兒水腫   腎小球腎炎 1． 急性腎小球腎炎的概念，與中醫學病名的關係，發病情況。 2． 急性腎小球腎炎臨床診斷。急性腎小球腎炎與腎病綜合征的鑒別診斷。 3． 感受風邪、濕熱、瘡毒的外因，肺、脾、腎不足的內因。邪正交爭，肺、脾、腎水液氣化功能失職的病機。 4． 急性腎小球腎炎常證辨風、濕、熱毒，變證辨心、肝、肺臟及水毒濕濁。祛邪、扶正，利水滲濕的治療原則。變證配合西藥應用的原則。 5． 證治分類：急性期常證風水相搏證治以疏風宣肺，利水消腫；濕熱內侵證治以清熱利濕，涼血止血。變證邪陷心肝證治以平肝瀉火，清心利水；水淩心肺證治以瀉肺逐水，溫陽扶正；水毒內閉證治以通腑泄濁，解毒利尿。恢復期陰虛邪戀證治以滋陰補腎，兼清餘熱；氣虛邪戀證治以健脾化濕。 6． 急性腎小球腎炎的調護。   腎病綜合征 1． 腎病綜合征的概念，與中醫學病名的關係，發病情況。 2． 腎病綜合征臨床診斷。腎病綜合征與急性腎炎鑒別診斷。 3． 稟賦不足、久病體虛、外邪入裏病因。腎、脾、肺功能失職，水津失布病機。 4． 腎病綜合征的標、本，虛、實辨證。扶正培本為主，祛邪安正為輔的治療法則。中西藥配合使用的原則和方法。 5． 證治分類：本證肺脾氣虛證治以益氣健脾，宣肺利水；脾腎陽虛證治以溫腎健脾，化氣行水；肝腎陰虛證治以滋陰補腎，平肝潛陽；氣陰兩虛證治以益氣養陰，化濕清熱。標證外感風邪治以宣肺祛風；水濕治以通利行水；濕熱治以清熱利濕；血瘀治以活血化瘀；濕濁治以利濕泄濁。  尿頻 1． 尿頻的概念，與西醫學病名的關係。 2． 尿頻的診斷要點。尿路感染與神經性尿頻的鑒別診斷。 3． 濕熱邪侵的外因，脾腎虧虛的內因。濕熱蘊結下焦蒸迫、脾腎虧虛氣化失職、腎陰不足虛熱內生，膀胱失約的病機。 4． 尿頻實證濕、熱辨證，虛證脾、腎辨證。清利、補攝治法的應用原則。 5． 證治分類：濕熱下注證治以清熱利濕，通利膀胱；脾腎氣虛證治以溫補脾腎，升提固攝；陰虛內熱證治以滋陰清熱。  遺尿 1． 遺尿的概念，發病情況。 2． 先天稟賦未充、後天發育遲緩；肺、脾、腎功能失調，心火、肝熱下迫的病因。三焦氣化失司，膀胱約束不利的病機。 3． 遺尿的虛實、寒熱辨證。 4． 證治分類：肺脾氣虛證治以補肺益脾，固澀膀胱；腎氣不足證治以溫補腎陽，固澀小便；心腎失交證治以清心滋腎，安神固脬。  傳染病 麻疹  1． 麻疹的概念，古今臨床的發病情況。 2． 麻疹（包括輕症）的臨床診斷。 3． 感受麻疹病毒時邪的病因。順證病初邪犯肺衛、繼入肺胃氣營、後期陰津耗傷，逆證邪毒閉肺、邪毒攻喉、邪陷心肝的病機。 4． 麻疹順證（包括輕症）、逆證辨證要點。“麻不厭透”、“麻喜清涼”的治療原則。 5． 證治分類：順證邪犯肺衛證治以辛涼透表，清宣肺衛；邪入肺胃證治以清涼解毒，透疹達邪；陰津耗傷證治以養陰益氣，清解餘邪；逆證邪毒閉肺證治以宣肺開閉，清熱解毒；邪毒攻喉證治以清熱解毒，利咽消腫；邪陷心肝證治以清營解毒，平肝熄風。麻疹的外治療法。 6． 麻疹的預防與調護。  風痧（風疹） 1． 風疹的概念，中醫學病名，發病情況，孕婦患風疹對胎兒的危害。 2． 風疹的診斷。 3． 風疹病毒時邪的病因，邪毒與氣血相搏，外泄肌膚的病機。 4． 證治分類：邪犯肺衛證治以疏風解表清熱，邪入氣營證治以清氣涼營解毒。 5． 孕婦預防風疹的重要性。  丹痧（猩紅熱）  1． 猩紅熱的概念，中醫病名，發病情況。 2． 猩紅熱診斷要點。猩紅熱與麻疹、幼兒急疹、風疹的鑒別診斷。 3． 水痘診斷要點。水痘與膿皰瘡的鑒別診斷。 3． 感受水痘病毒時邪的病因。時邪犯於肺脾，濕熱蘊蒸，透于肺衛肌表的病機。 4． 衛分、氣分、營分辨證要點。清熱解毒利濕的治療原則。 5． 證治分類：邪傷肺衛證治以疏風清熱，利濕解毒；毒熾氣營證治以清氣涼營，解毒化濕。  痄腮（流行性腮腺炎） 1. 流行性腮腺炎的概念，中醫病名，發病情況。 2. 流行性腮腺炎診斷要點，流行性腮腺炎與化膿性腮腺炎的鑒別診斷。 3. 感受流行性腮腺炎病毒時邪的病因。邪毒壅阻足少陽、足厥陰經脈，氣血鬱滯，甚至內陷心肝、毒竄睾腹的病機。 4. 常證、變證辨證。清熱解毒、軟堅散結的治療法則，內治、外治相結合的治療原則。 5. 感受流行性乙型腦炎病毒時邪的病因。熱、痰、風的演變與轉化，急性期衛、氣營、血的傳變特點。 4． 急性期衛、氣、營、血分辨證，各期熱、痰、風辨證要點。清熱、豁痰、開竅、熄風治療原則在各期的應用。 5． 證治分類：初期、極期邪犯衛氣證治以辛涼解表，清暑化濕；邪熾氣營證治以清氣涼營，瀉火滌痰；邪入營血證治以涼血清心，增液潛陽。恢復期、後遺症期陰虛內熱證治以養陰清熱；營衛不和證治以調和營衛；痰蒙清竅證治以豁痰開竅；痰火內擾證治以滌痰瀉火；氣虛血瘀證治以益氣養陰，活血通絡；風邪留絡證治以搜風通絡，養血舒筋。 6． 流行性乙型腦炎的中藥成藥、針灸療法、推拿療法。 7． title: Different Schools of Chinese Medicine
description: This course discusses the origin, the theoretical background and the development of Chinese medicine. Through the study of this course, the students will be able to master the major events in the history of Chinese medicine, the different important schools of thoughts in Chinese medicine and compares their viewpoints on the causes and treatments of diseases. Emphasis will be placed on the training students’ practical skills in clinical thinking, so that the course will lay a solid foundation for clinical study.
outcome: 本科是中医临床学科的进深科目，完成本课程后，期望学生能达到以下学习成果：  （一）知識方面： 1. 了解医学流派的形成与发展概况。 2. 掌握伤寒学派与温病学派形成和发展的主要阶段。 3. 掌握河间学派、攻邪学派、易水学派、丹溪学派、温补学派的创立、学术继承、发展概况及其代表著作、主要学术成就。 4. 了解汇通学派的代表医家、代表著作及其主要学术成就与主张。 5. 掌握各个学派的概念，熟悉其对中医学发展的影响与贡献。 6. 掌握孙思邈、王冰、 钱乙、 许叔微、严用和、 成无己、 刘完素、 张元素、 李杲、王好古、罗天益、 张从正、朱震亨、 戴思恭、王履、 薛己、张介宾、李时珍、吴有性、叶桂、吴瑭、王清任、吴师机及唐宗海 等医家的主要著作、主要学术内容与评价。 7. 了解教材中其他医家的主要著作、学术内容与评价。 8. 了解各医家的生平，阅读教材中的医案家选录、原著摘录和参考数据。  （二）专业技能方面： 1. 能把历代各名家的临床思维及其专长在临床上灵活应用。 2. 能够发掘前贤真知灼见。 3. 能够对前人经验的阐发加以提高。 4. 能够继承临床上面临失传的宝贵经验。 5. 能为今后科研提供研究思路。  （三） 共通能力方面：  1. 增强沟通及人际技巧。 2. 提高解难的分析力及判断力。  （四）态度/价值观方面 ： 1. 树立追求更好和完善的人生态度。  2. 增强追求更精确的科学态度。

title: Research Methodologies in Chinese Medicine
description: Research work plays an important role in all health care professions including Chinese Medicine. Valid research outputs can be used to improve patient care. This course introduces students to the basic knowledge in Chinese Medicine research. Topics include: document retrieval, principles and methods of research methodologies used in clinical, experimental and traditional theory research in Chinese Medicine, basic statistic principle, thesis writing and presentation. Each Student will undergo a research project under the supervision of an instructor.
outcome: 通過本課程之學習，學生應能夠 :  1. 了解中醫學研究方法的特點。 2. 掌握文獻檢索方法及熟習主要的醫學文獻資料庫，充分利用古今醫學資料。 3. 了解醫學統計學的意義、價值，不同的方法和選擇性應用。 4. 熟悉中醫藥臨床、基礎實驗研究及中醫傳統理論研究的原則和基本方法。 5. 透過研究鞏固中醫學知識及訓練邏輯思維。 6. 從事專項研究的基本工作並撰寫中醫學研究論文，為日後中醫學研究工作提供基礎知識。
syllabus: 課程簡介、文獻檢索方法、臨床研究的基本原則和方法、實驗研究方法概述、中醫傳統理論研究方法、醫學統計學概述、在導師指導下進行研究，完成研究論文、論文答辯。

title: Principles of Chinese Medicine
requirements: For students in Master of Chinese Medicine
description: This course is one of the fundamental courses in Chinese medicine. Through the systematic introduction of the basic theories in Chinese medicine with topics like yin-yang, vital activities of the body, meridians, viscera and bowels, causes and mechanisms of diseases and methods of diagnosis, students will be able to master the philosophical thoughts of Chinese medicine, the basic theories on the human body and diseases, and the principles of health maintenance and treatment. This course also explains the essence of pattern differentiation and treatment determination and concept of holism, which are the unique characteristics of Chinese medicine.
outcome: 本課程屬於中醫專業的基礎課程。通過本課程的學習，學生應能：  1. 引述中醫理論體系的主要特點，並說出中醫學和中醫基礎理論的基本概念、其形成和發展簡況。 2. 明確精、氣、陰陽、五行的基本概念和主要內容及其在中醫學中的應用。 3. 講述氣血津液的基本概念、生成、傳輸及功能，及氣血津液之間的關係。 4. 指出藏象的基本概念和五臟、六腑和奇恒之府的分類法，說明五臟的主要功能、特性和各髒氣、血、陰、陽的涵義，指出六腑和奇恒之府的主要功能，及髒與髒、腑與腑和髒與腑的關係。 5. 描述經絡的概念、經絡系統的組成和基本生理功能，指出十二經脈和奇經八脈中沖、任、督、帶脈的循行路線和主要功能。 6. 理解病因學說的概念，探求病因的主要方法及其分類方法，並熟悉六淫、七情、痰飲、瘀血的內容。 7. 說出發病的原理、影響發病的主要因素和發病的類型，並重新敘述邪正盛衰、陰陽失調、氣血失常、津液運化失常的基本病機。列舉疾病轉變的基本概念和病位傳變、寒熱轉化、虛實轉化的具體規律。 8. 表述治療的基本原則。
syllabus: 緒論: 中醫學和中醫理論體系的形成、發展及其整體觀念、辨證論治。 精氣學說: 氣的基本概念、精氣學說的主要內容（氣的本質、特性、化生）及其在中醫學中的應用。 陰陽學說: 陰陽的基本概念、陰陽學說的主要內容（陰陽交感、對立、互根互用、消長平衡、相互轉化）及其在中醫學中的應用。 五行學說: 五行的基本概念、五行學說的主要內容（五行各自特性、事物歸類方法、其生克制化、乘侮和母子相及）及其在中醫學中的應用。 藏象: 藏象的基本概念；五臟的功能與特性，六腑、奇恒之府的功能；臟與臟、腑與腑和臟與腑的關係。 氣血津液: 氣血津液的基本概念。氣的生成、運動、功能及分類；血的生成、循行、功能；津液的生成、轉輸與排泄和功能；气血津液相互间的关系。 .經絡: 經絡的概念、經絡系統、基本生理功能；十二經脈和奇經八脈。 病因: 病因學說的概念、特點，探求病因的主要方法及其分類方法。外感病因︰六淫和癘氣；內傷病因︰七情、勞逸、飲食失宜。病理產物形成的病因（水濕痰飲、瘀血、結石）和其他病因（藥邪、醫過、先天因素）。 發病、病機 治療原則: 發病原理、影響發病的主要因素和發病的類型。基本病機和疾病轉變。治療的基本原則.

title: Diagnostic Approaches in Chinese Medicine Practice
requirements: For students in Master of Chinese Medicine
description: Diagnostic Approaches in Chinese Medicine is a subject about the fundamental theories, basic knowledge and skills concerning how to collect clinical information, diagnose diseases and differentiate patterns based on the basic theories of Chinese medicine. This module acts as a bridge linking the fundamental theories and various clinical subjects in Chinese medicine, and thus remains as one of the key components within the framework of Chinese medicine's specialties. Through the studies of this course, the students will be able to master the basic theories, fundamental knowledge and skills concerning the four diagnostic methods in Chinese medicine including observation, olfaction and auscultation, inquiring and palpation. Upon the completion of the course, the students will be capable of making clinical diagnosis using common pattern differentiation methods encompassing eight rubrics, etiology & qi, blood and body fluids, visceral differentiations. In addition, the students will be familiar with six channels differentiation, wei-qi-ying-xue differentiation, sanjiao differentiation and meridian differentiation methods. Emphasis will be placed on the training students’ practical skills in four diagnostic methods, differentiating clinical patterns and writing clinical case notes, so that the course will lay a solid foundation for future studies of clinical subjects. The module Basic Concepts in Chinese Medicine is a prerequisite for this course.
outcome: 完成本課程後，學生們將能達到以下的學習成果： （一）知識方面： 1. 解釋中醫診斷學常見的概念；說明中醫診斷的基本原則、基本原理及主要內容。 2. 說明得神、失神、假神、常色的和病色的特徵及其臨床意義；描述常見異常形體、姿態的表現，色澤變化及五色所主病證。 3. 說明正常舌象的表現，異常舌象的表現及其一般臨床意義；描述舌的結構。 4. 說明咳嗽、哮、喘、呃逆、噯氣、噴嚏、譫語等變化及其一般臨床意義；以及病理性氣味等變化及其臨床意義。 5. 說明問診的內容，常見現在症的內容；熟悉問診注意事項。 6. 說明寸口脈診的方法，正常脈象的特徵，常見脈象的特徵與臨床意義，相兼脈的結合與主病規律；說明脈診的原理及診脈的意義，脈象的生理變異，以及診婦人脈、診小兒脈的特殊性。 7. 說明按診的意義。 8. 說明八綱辨證的概念 ，各綱證候的概念、一般證候表現及臨床類型； 9. 說明病因、氣血津液辨證的概念、各自包括的證候；熟悉病因病性的意義；  10. 說明各臟腑的病變範圍和病機特點，及各臟腑常見證的含義、臨床表現和病機； 11. 說明六經辨證、衛氣營血辨證、三焦辨證、經絡辨證的基本知識和方法； 12. 說明中醫病案書寫通則。    （二）專業技能方面： 1. 運用望神的具體步驟和能夠判斷常見異常形體、姿態的表現； 2. 運用舌診的方法，能夠識別臨床常見的病理性舌象；  3. 能夠判斷呼吸、語言、嘔吐等聲音的高低、強弱、清濁以及病理氣味等變化；  4. 能夠運用問診方法進行病情資料的收集； 5. 運用寸口脈診的方法，熟悉正常脈象及各種病理脈象的指下感覺特徵； 6. 運用和熟練運用常用按診的手法； 7. 能夠運用八綱辨證對臨床病例進行辨證； 8. 能夠運用病因、氣血津液辨證對臨床病例進行辨證； 9. 能夠運用臟腑辨證對臨床典型病例進行辨證； 10. 能夠運用六經辨證、衛氣營血辨證、三焦辨證對臨床典型病例進行辨證； 11. 能夠按照常規格式書寫中醫門診病歷。  (三)　共通能力方面 1. 增強溝通及人際技巧。 2. 提高解難的分析力及判斷力。  （四）態度/價值觀方面 1. 樹立追求更好和完善的人生態度。 2. 增強追求更精確的科學態度。
syllabus: 緒論: 中醫診斷的基本原則; 中醫“診斷”、“診法”、“辨病”、“辨證”、“病案”、“證”、“病”、“症”等概念; 中醫診斷的基本原理; 中醫診斷的發展概況。 望診: 整體望診之得神、失神、假神、常色的和病色的特徵及其臨床意義; 常見異常形體、姿態的表現，色澤變化及五色所主病證; 局部望診之望形體、望姿態、望頭面五官、望肢體皮膚、望二陰、望排出物、望小兒指紋的基本內容。 舌診: 舌診的方法，正常舌象的表現，異常舌象（病理舌色、舌形、舌態、和舌苔）的表現及其一般臨床意義; 臨床常見的舌象及主病; 舌的結構，舌診原理; 舌診的現代研究進展。 聞診: 咳嗽、哮、喘、呃逆、噯氣、噴嚏、譫語等變化及其一般臨床意義; 呼吸、語言、嘔吐等聲音的高低、強弱、清濁等變化的一般臨床意義; 口氣、汗、痰、二便、帶下以及病室氣味等變化及其臨床意義 問診: 問診的內容，包括《十問歌》，常見現在症的內容; 問診的方法及注意事項，常見現在症的表現及其臨床意義; 問診在中醫診斷中的意義。 脈診: 寸口脈診的方法，正常脈象的特徵，常見脈象（浮、沉、遲、數、實、洪、細、弦、緊、滑、澀、濡、緩、弱、微、促、結、代）的特徵與臨床意義，相兼脈的結合與主病規律;　脈診的原理及診脈的意義，脈象的生理變異，長、短、芤、革、牢、伏、散、動、疾脈的特徵和臨床意義，診婦人脈、診小兒脈的特殊性; 遍診法、三部診法的診脈部位，真臟脈特徵的臨床意義，脈診的研究進展。 按診: 按診的方法，按脘腹的內容及意義; 按診的意義，按胸脅、按肌膚、按手足、按腧穴的內容與意義; 按診的現代研究進展。 八綱辨證: 八綱辨證的概念；八綱各綱證候的概念、一般證候表現及臨床類型; 表證與裏證、寒證與熱證的鑒別要點，虛證與實證各自包括的內容；陽虛證、陰虛證、亡陽證、亡陰證的概念與證候表現; 八綱之間的相兼、錯雜、真假、轉化關係；八綱辨證的意義; 八綱辨證的發展情況。 病因、氣血津液辨證: 病因、氣血津液辨證的概念、各自包括的證候; 風、寒、暑、濕、燥、熱（實火）、毒、膿、食積、蟲積、氣虛、血虛、氣滯、血瘀，痰、飲、水停、津液虧虛等證的含義與證候表現; 病因病性的意義; 病因與氣血津液辨證各證的常見證名，各證之間的兼併、因果關係。 臟腑辨證: 各臟腑的病變範圍和病機特點，掌握各臟腑常見證的含義、臨床表現和病機; 臟腑辨證的概念、基本方法、意義及運用範圍; 臟腑之間的發病關係。 其他辨證方法: 簡介六經辨證、衛氣營血辨證、三焦辨證、經絡辨證的基本知識及六經、衛氣營血、三焦病證的傳變關係。 診法與辨證運用（自學）: 辨證的基本內容與具體要求; 病情資料的綜合處理，辨證思維的方法; 辨證的步驟，辨證與診法的關係。 疾病診斷概論（自學）:“病”的概念，病、證、症之間的關係; 疾病診斷及辨病與辨證相結合的意義; 疾病的命名形式，疾病分類的方法。 中醫病案書寫: 中醫病案書寫通則; 病案書寫的意義、內容、格式; 病案書寫的沿革。

title: Fundamental Biomedical Science
requirements: For students in MChi.Med.
description: This course introduces basic biomedical sciences involving Anatomy, Physiology and Biochemistry to Chinese Medicine students. This course deals with the basic anatomy and physiology of various systems including the general physiology of humans, with an objective of enhancing the students' knowledge and understanding of how the body adapts physiologically to internal and external environmental changes. Topics include the physiological principles of normal cells, tissues and systems of the body. The course also provides knowledge of biochemistry of nutrients and nucleic acid and biochemical regulations which have clinical applications. This course is a prerequisite to Modern Medical Science I & II.
outcome: By the end of the course, students will be able to:  Anatomy: 1. Have an understanding of the primary parts of the body and their specific construction which aligned the execution of their functions. 2. Understand how different structures group together to form systems. 3. Understand how changes in these primary structures will lead to malfunction. Physiology 1. Understand the physiological properties of cell, tissue, organ and system. 2. Describe with examples how homeostasis helps maintain physiological functions. 3. Recall the organization of the nervous system and state how autonomic nervous system affects body functions. 4. Explain how the special senses particularly those in the eyes and ears function in human. 5. Discuss how the circulatory system helps regulate blood perfusion in body tissues. 6. Summarize how some of the altered functions in the cardiovascular and pulmonary systems affect the body. 7. Summarize the roles of blood in hemostasis and immune defense. 8. Explain how the pulmonary system and blood transport oxygen to tissues and carbon dioxide from the tissues. 9. Recognize how a skeletal muscle contracts and recall the importance of neuromuscular transmission in a human body. 10. Summarize how the gastrointestinal system carries out the digestion and absorption of ingested food. 11. Explain the processes by how the kidneys regulate the body fluid volume and its composition. 12. Outline the roles of various hormones and understand the mechanisms of their secretions. 13. Understand the basic functions and hormonal control of the male and female reproductive system. 14. Recognize how a skeletal muscle contracts and recall the importance of neuromuscular transmission in a human body. Biochemistry 1. Outline the absorption and regulation of nutrients. 2. Summarize how the gene regulation of cell which affected by drugs, especially by examples of Chinese Medicine 3. Describe with examples how biochemical regulation affect the whole human body 4. Understandthe roles and regulations of glucose and lipoproteinsin human body and relevance of them to diseases. 5. Understand basic principles and clinical applications of common methods in biochemistry.

title: Chinese Medicine Clerkship I
requirements: For students in MChi.Med.
description: Clinical Training is an important step to enhance the clinical skill of Chinese medicine for students, which is essential for the education of Chinese medicine practitioner. Through clinical practice, students can enhance their clinical skill through collecting patients’ Information by observation, auscultation & olfaction, interrogation, and palpation. Further, in these process, students can learn how to analyze the etiology and pathogenesis of disease, make TCM syndrome diagnosis, and have basic understanding of treatment, prevention and rehabilitation of common disease in various specialties of Chinese medicine, including internal medicine, surgery, gynecology, pediatric, acupuncture and bone setting. These training will help students to establish a good foundation for clinical practice in future.
outcome: 1. 初步了解診所日常運作 2. 能說明中醫師常規診療步驟 3. 能按規範運用四診方法 4. 能根據四診所得，簡單分析病機 5. 能簡單描述針灸的操作過程 6. 能根據臨床實際情況，歸納分析經絡的應用 7. 能展現應有的專業態度和操守
syllabus: 1.中醫診所日常運作: 觀察中醫診療環境中各部門如前台、藥房、診室的運作及溝通。2.中醫臨床常規診療步驟及規範:觀察醫師診證和實施治療的步驟、注意事項和操作規範。3.中醫理論基礎: 中醫的整體觀念、辨證論治、陰陽五行學說、病因病機學說、臟腑學說、經絡學說。4.中醫診斷學: 中醫的診法、各種辨證方法（八綱辨證、氣血津液辨證、病因辨證、臟腑辨證、衛氣營血辨證、三焦辨證、六經辨證和經絡辨證等）。5.中藥學: 中藥性能、常用中藥的性味、功效、劑量及臨床運用。6. 經穴學: 經絡理論，常用穴位的定位、穴性和臨床運用。

title: Chinese Materia Medica
requirements: For students in Master of Chinese Medicine
description: Chinese Materia Medica is a course deals with the medical properties and clinical applications of Chinese material medical. It is one of the fundamental courses of Chinese medicine. This course consists of two parts: The first part covers the theories of Chinese medical material and the second part is about the medical properties and applications of different medicines.It is based on Chinese medicine theories, with particular emphasis on the pattern differentiation of Chinese medicine. Result of modern pharmaceutical research will also be introduced so as to provide basic knowledge about Chinese medicine research for the students.Besides lecture, other learning activities will also be included in this course, such as specimen observation, on-the-spot processing observation of Chinese medical material.
outcome: 完成本科目後，學生期望能夠： 1. 講述中藥的起源和中藥學發展概況。 2. 說明中藥產地與藥效的關係，及常用炮制方法及其作用原理。 3. 指出中藥性味、升降浮沉、歸經、配伍、禁忌等基本理論和使用原則。 4. 列舉或詳述300種左右常用中藥(其中重點藥物約190餘種，一般藥物約100種)的分類、性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量、使用注意及同類藥性能比較。 辨識90多種指定常用中藥材飲片樣本。
syllabus: 1.總論概述，中藥學的發展、中藥的性能中藥的炮製目的及方法、配伍、用藥禁忌、用藥劑量與用法(自學內容，考核内容)中藥的產地和採集、中藥的起源(自學內容，不考核)2.解表藥概述，發散風寒及疏散風熱常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意3.清熱藥概述，清熱瀉火、清熱燥濕、清熱解毒、清熱涼血及清虛熱常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意4.祛寒藥概述，祛寒常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意5.瀉下藥概述，攻下、潤下及峻下逐水常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意6.治風藥概述，袪風寒濕、袪風濕熱、袪風濕強筋骨、平肝息風常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意7.袪濕藥概述，芳香化濕、利水消腫及利尿通淋常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意8.理氣藥概述，理氣常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意9.理血藥概述，活血化瘀、止血常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意10.化痰止咳平喘藥概述，化痰、止咳平喘常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意11.補益藥概述，補氣、補陽、補血、補陰常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意12.收澀藥概述，固表止汗、斂肺澀腸、固精縮尿止帶常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意13.消食藥(自學內容)概述(自學內容，考核内容)消食導滯常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意(自學內容，不考核)14.安神藥(自學內容)概述(自學內容，考核内容)鎮靜安神常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意(自學內容，不考核)15.開竅藥(自學內容)概述(自學內容，考核内容)涼開、溫開常用藥的性味、歸經、功效、主治、用法用量及使用注意(自學內容，不考核)

title: Yellow Emperor’s Inner Canon
requirements: For students in Master of Chinese Medicine
description: Huang-Di-Nei-Jing (The Yellow Emperor’s Inner Canon) is the earliest Chinese medical literature. It sets up the foundation of the theories of Chinese medicine and, throughout the years, the developments of Chinese medicine were based on it. By means of explaining the original texts, this subject focuses on deepening the understanding of the theoretical system of Chinese medicine and its related background of traditional culture, cultivating students’ abilities of applying the thought ways in Chinese medicine consciously. It therefore is the foundation for learning other subjects of Chinese medicine.
outcome: 通過本課程的學習，同學應能夠：  1、 指出《内經》的學術思想與學術體系及學習方法； 2、 解釋相關原文之古文字意義，並能熟記一部分要求背誦之原文； 3、 從文字運用、醫學理論論述等方面說明所選讀之原文的醫學内容及傳統中醫的思維模式，並能自覺運用傳統中醫的思維方式於中醫各科的學習之中。

title: Modern Medical Science I
requirements: For students in Master of Chinese Medicine
description: This course serves as an introduction to the broad spectrum of western diseases. Fundamental concepts of western medicine including pathology, microbiology and diseases involved different physiological systems will be covered. Besides, clinical knowledge concerning the history taking, physical examination, laboratory investigation and treatments will also be introduced.
outcome: At the end of the course, students will be able to understand the basic concepts and fundamental principles of pathology, microbiology and common diseases involved different systems in human body. Students are also expected to be familiar with the clinical approach of western medicine in managing diseases.
syllabus: 1.Introductory Pathology & Fundamental DiagnosisBasic principles of pathology; cell injury, necrosis, inflammation, edema, tissue repair, neoplasia etc. History taking, physical examination, including examination of head & neck, cardiothoracic, abdominal, skeletal & NS. Diagnosis & differential diagnoses. Laboratory investigations, electrocardiography, imaging techniques (ultrasound, x-ray, CT, MRI, Nuclear medicine), endoscopy, cytology & histopathology etc.2.Microbiology & Infectious DiseasesBasic principles of microbiology, brief introduction to various types of microorganism, asepsis, antiobiotic therapy. Common infectious diseases, clinical features, investigations & treatment.3.HematologyAnatomy & physiology of the bone marrow, blood cells. Investigation of blood disorders. Overview of common blood diseases including clinical features, investigations & treatment. These include common anemias, bleeding disorders, leukemias, lymphomas, myelomas etc.4.Immunology & RheumatologyBasic principles of immunology, cells, antibodies & chemical mediators. Disorders of the immune system: deficiency, hypersensitivity, autoimmunity, transplant rejection.Rheumatology: anatomy of the synovial joint, clinical features of rheumatic diseases; overview of common rheumatic diseases: rheumatoid arthritis, SLE, gout, osteoarthritis, rheumatic fever, ankylosing spondylitis etc.5.EndocrinologyAnatomy & physiology of the endocrine glands. Investigation of endocrine diseases. Overview of common endocrine diseases: hyperthyroidism, hypothyroidism, growth hormone abnormalities, adrenal gland abnormalities, Diabetes mellitus etc.6.Cardiovascular systemAnatomy & physiology of the CVS. Manifestations of CV diseases. Overview of common CV diseases: Coronary artery diseases, valvular heart diseases, hypertension, heart failure etc.

title: Chinese Medicine Clerkship III
requirements: For students in MChi.Med.
description: Clinical Training is an important step to enhance the clinical skill of Chinese medicine for students, which is essential for the education of Chinese medicine practitioner. Through clinical practice, students can enhance their clinical skill through collecting patients’ information by observation, auscultation & olfaction, interrogation, and palpation. Further, in these process, students can learn how to analyze the etiology and pathogenesis of disease, make TCM syndrome diagnosis, and have basic understanding of treatment, prevention and rehabilitation of common disease in various specialties of Chinese medicine, including internal medicine, surgery, gynecology, pediatric, acupuncture and bone setting. These trainings will help students to establish a good foundation for clinical practice in future.
outcome: 1. 能根據臨床實際情況，分析臨床不同專科常見病的病機和治療原理 2. 能按規範書寫臨床病案 3. 能清晰報告和討論臨床病例，展現對臨床常見疾病進行辨證論治的能力 4. 能展現應有的專業態度和操守
syllabus: 1.中醫內科學重點病證的病因病機、診斷與鑒別診斷、辨證要點、治則治法及分型證治。 2.針灸學針、灸和火罐等治療方法和使用技巧，及常見疾病的治療方法。3.中醫外科學常見中醫外科疾病的病因病機、診斷與鑒別要點和基本內、外治法及外用藥物劑型的選擇標準。中醫婦科學女性在經、帶、胎、產、雜等方面常見病的辨證論治。4.中醫臨床骨傷科學常見中醫骨傷科學疾病的病因病機、診斷與鑒別要點和基本內、外治治則治法。5.中醫兒科學常見中醫兒科學疾病的病因病機、診斷與鑒別要點和基本治則治法。

title: Chinese Medicine Formulae
requirements: For students in Master of Chinese Medicine
description: This is a course that deals with the principles and applications of Chinese medicinal prescriptions. In this course, students are trained to be familiar with the composition, uses, rationale and variability of some 180 common herbal formulae.
outcome: 1. 明確方劑學在中醫學中的地位及重要性。 2. 理解方劑學的發展概況及歷代醫家在方劑學方面具有代表性的成就及其歷史意義。 3. 解釋方劑學的理論知識、治法與方劑的關係、組方原則和方劑的運用變化及其對方劑功能主治的影響。 4. 了解方劑的臨床運用以及劑型、用法等基本知識。 5. 說明最常用方劑180首的組成、功效、方義、主治、主要加減變化及近代研究進展情況。
syllabus: 1.  總論具有代表性方劑學的成就及歷史意義，方劑與治法，常用治法，方劑的分類（自學不考）。方劑的組成原則及組成變化，劑型(自學要考)，煎藥法及服藥法（自學不考）。2.  解表劑解表常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。3.瀉下劑瀉下常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。4.  和解劑和解常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。 5.  清熱劑清熱常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。 6.  祛寒劑祛寒常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。 7.  補益劑補益常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。 8.  固澀劑固澀常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。 9.  理氣劑理氣常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。10. 理血劑理血常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。11. 治風劑治風常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。12. 祛濕劑祛濕常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。13. 祛痰劑祛痰常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。14.安神劑（自學內容，不考核）安神常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。15.消導劑（自學內容，不考核）消導常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。16.祛蟲劑（自學內容，不考核）祛蟲常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。17. 開竅劑（自學內容，不考核）開竅常用方劑的組成、用法、功用、主治、方解及運用。

title: Treatise on Exogenous Febrile Diseases
requirements: For students in Master of Chinese Medicine
description: As one of the most important classics in Chinese Medicine, Treatise on Exogenous Febrile Diseases (Shang Han Lun) focuses on the treatment of cold-attack disease and forms a recognition system with theory, therapy, formula and herbs, which is termed as theoretical system of treatment based on syndrome differentiation. Such thinking way and treatment system have played a great impact on the development of Chinese medicine in clinical treatment for thousands of years. By means of studying the original texts, students should learn to understand the method of syndrome differentiation, especially for the cold-attack disease and further to understand its important significance in clinical treatment, which will enable them to establish a solid foundation for the study of various clinical courses.
outcome: 通過本課程的學習，同學應能夠：  1、 認識傷寒病與六經辨證的基本意義； 2、 熟悉相關原文之古文字意義並能熟記一部分要求背誦之原文及相關的方劑組成與藥物特點； 3、 從病、證、方、藥各個方面理解所選讀之條文的醫學内容，並能將六經辨證方法初步運用於臨床實際之中； 4、 通過專題研究，深入了解《傷寒論》之研究過程並完成指定條文的專題報告。
syllabus: 緒論:　　 認識傷寒病與六經辨證的基本意義 辨太陽病脈證並治 辨陽明病脈證並治 辨少陽病脈證並治 辨太陰病脈證並治 辨少陰病脈證並治 辨厥陰病脈證並治熟悉六經病相關原文之古文字意義並能熟記一部分要求背誦之原文及相關的方劑組成與藥物特點從病、證、方、藥各個方面理解所選讀之條文的醫學内容

title: The Meridian System
requirements: For students in Master of Chinese Medicine
description: This course is one of the main components of Acupuncture and Chinese medicine theory, which is also the basic concept of acupuncture. Based on the clinical theory, this course introduces some of the main acupuncture points and explains their clinical application, treatment and points’ location. It also emphases on the points’ clinical treatment technique. The course will also describe the causes and prevention methods of accidents commonly encountered in acupuncture.
outcome: 完成本課程後，期望學生能達到以下學習成果： 1. 清楚十四經絡的循行規律，分支及循行，並能辨識身體局部以及常見病症之所屬經絡。 2. 了解十四經絡中重點穴位的位置、功效及現代研究概況，並能分析這些腧穴的功效及臨床應用。 3. 認識奇經八脈及其相關穴位、功效，並能說明其臨床應用。 4. 認識重要的特定穴位，並能說明其臨床應用。 5. 熟練毫針補瀉手法及各類刺灸法的內容，並準確實施操作手法

title: Modern Medical Science II
requirements: For students in Master of Chinese Medicine
description: This is a continuation of BCME 5205 to enable students to understand pathogenesis and modern management of common diseases. Topics include the pathological, biochemical and physiological basis of common diseases; diagnositic approaches; drug and surgical treatment of common diseases; mechanisms of drug action; and drug interactions. This course also introduces students to the family medicine, epidemiology, preventive medicine, and radiological and laboratory test methods.
outcome: At the end of the course, students will be able to understand the basic concepts and fundamental principles of pathology, microbiology and common diseases involved different systems in human body. Students are also expected to be familiar with the clinical approach of western medicine in managing diseases.
syllabus: Respiratory System :Anatomy & physiology of the respiratory system. Common manifestation of respiratory diseases. Investigation of respiratory disorders. Overview of common respiratory diseases: Infection: pneumonia, tuberculosis; asthma, chronic bronchitis, emphysema, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease; lung tumors; pulmonary fibrosis; pleural & mediastinal diseases etc.Gastrointestinal system & hepatology: Anatomy & physiology of the GIT, manifestations of GI diseases, investigative methods of GIT diseases; overview of GI diseases. Anatomy & physiology of the liver & biliary system. Manifestation of liver diseases, jaundice, portal hypertension, liver failure. Investigation of liver & biliary tree. Overview of liver & biliary diseases: hepatitis, cirrhosis, neoplasm, diseases of the bile ducts & gallbladder.Renal System :Anatomy & physiology of the renal system. Manifestation of diseases of the urinary tract. Investigative methods for the urinary tract. Overview of diseases of the urinary tract: infection, glomerulonephritis, stone, neoplasm, congenital defects, renal failure, uremia etc.Nervous System :Anatomy & physiology of the nervous system. Clinical manifestations of diseases involving the nervous system. Investigative methods for the nervous system. Overview of diseases of the nervous system: cerebrovascular, degenerative, infection of the nervous system, diseases of the spinal cord, cranial nerves & peripheral nerves.Reproductive system :Anatomy & physiology of the male & female reproductive systems. Overview of diseases of the male and female reproductive system.General Surgery :General principles of surgery: metabolic response to surgery, investigation & diagnosis of patients requiring surgery, fluid & electrolyte imbalance, wound management, wound healing, pre- & postoperative management, anesthesia, surgical infections. Common surgical conditions.

title: Golden Chamber
requirements: For students in MChi.Med.
description: This course teaches the medical classic named Jin-Gui-Yao-Lue. The main focus of the course is to analyze the major texts of this classic so as to enrich students’ knowledge for further medical diagnosis. Through the course, students will acquire a good command in analyzing examples of different diseases in Jin-Gui-Yao-Lue, and apply in clinical treatment.
outcome: 完成本課程後，學生應能： １. 描述《金匱要略》的成書背景、學術成就及價值； ２. 描述所教授疾病的發病規律及診治方法與藏腑經絡辨證的基本意義； ３. 熟記要求背誦之原文、相關古文字的意義，以及方劑組成與藥物特點； ４. 從病、證、方、藥各個方面理解所選讀之條文的醫學内容並進行合理的分析。
syllabus: 緒言:《金匱要略》的成書背景、學術價值和學習方法 臟腑經絡先後病脈證第一:辨治雜病的指導原則和方法，如治未病、臟腑經絡辨證方法等 痓濕暍病脈證治第二:痙病、濕病、暍病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 百合狐惑陰陽毒病脈證治第三: 百合病、狐惑病、陰陽毒病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 瘧病脈證並治第四: 瘧病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 中風歷節病脈證並治第五: 中風病、歷節病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 血痹虛勞病脈證並治第六: 血痹病、虛勞病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 肺痿肺癰欬嗽上氣病脈證並治第七: 肺痿病、肺癰病、欬嗽上氣病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 奔豚氣病脈證治第八: 奔豚氣病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 胸痹心痛短氣病脈證治第九: 胸痹病、心痛病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 腹滿寒疝宿食病脈證治第十: 腹滿病、寒疝病、宿食病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 五臟風寒積聚病脈證並治第十一: 部分五臟風寒積聚病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 痰飲欬嗽病脈證並治第十二: 痰飲病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 消渴小便不利淋病脈證並治第十三: 消渴病、小便不利病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 水氣病脈證並治第十四: 水氣病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 黃疸病脈證並治第十五: 黃疸病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 驚悸吐衄下血胸滿瘀血病脈證治第十六 : 驚悸病、吐衄病、瘀血病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 嘔吐噦下利病脈證治第十七: 嘔吐病、噦病、下利病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 瘡癰腸癰浸淫病脈證並治第十八: 癰腫、腸癰、金瘡、浸淫瘡的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 趺蹶手指臂腫轉筋陰狐疝蚘蟲病脈證治第十九: 趺蹶、手指臂腫、轉筋、陰狐疝、蚘蟲的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 婦人妊娠病脈證並治第二十: 婦人妊娠諸病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 婦人產後病脈證治 第二十一: 婦人妊娠諸病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等 婦人雜病脈證並治第二十二: 婦人諸雜病的主症、病因病機、證治方藥等

title: Acupuncture Therapy
requirements: For students in MChi.Med.
description: Based on the knowledge of meridian and acu-points, this course intends to link principles of Chinese medicine and acupuncture with clinical practice. It will include topics such as syndrome differentiation and treatment of acupuncture in relevant diseases, setting therapeutic methods , prescription of acu-points, therapeutic techniques etc. Through this course, students will acquire basic knowledge and skills of acupuncture in clinical techniques, differentiation of important acu-points, principle of prescription, selection of tools and their application in common or urgent cases.
outcome: 完成本課程後，期望學生能達到以下學習成果： 1. 掌握針灸學科的辨證特點、規律和方法，能就常見多發病的病例說明病因病機、辨證分型、治療原則，擬定針灸處方，並選擇合適的刺灸操作方法。 2. 了解針灸操作過程的協作要求，並展現良好溝通技巧。
syllabus: 1．治療學總論介紹針灸治療取得療效的四個關鍵、治療作用和治療原理。2．治療學內科：中風及合併症、痿證、面癱、面痛、急痛(胸痹、腎絞痛)、頭痛、眩暈、嘔吐、顫證、癇症、哮喘、胃脘痛、脅痛、怔忡、不寐、臟躁(附：癔病)、鬱證、神昏、抽搐。傷科：痹證 (肩周炎、腰痛)、腰椎間盤突出症 (坐骨神經痛)、落枕婦科：月經不調、痛經、閉經、崩漏、帶下病兒科：小兒腦癱、小兒遺尿五官：耳鳴耳聾皮膚：蛇丹、癮疹、風疹、濕疹(小兒濕疹)男科：陽萎3．刺灸法熟練毫針補瀉手法及各類刺灸法的內容，並準確實施操作手法。4．個案討論透過接觸真實病人或討論書面案例，讓學生參與針灸治療從辨證到施治的思路全程。5．網上教學於網上教學平台設置課堂講義及多媒體課件，讓同學可重溫課堂重點，方便複習。

title: Clinical Tui Na
requirements: For students in MChi.Med.
description: Massage therapy is a kind of external treatment in clinical Chinese Medicine. Its prevention methods, mainly manual therapy and functional exercise. Manual therapy is the operator's hands or other parts of the body, or with certain equipment, the patient's body surface as normative actions to prevent and treat a treatment method for the purpose; training of massage is based on clinical need, the massage medical personnel trained to guide patient’s exercises to consolidate, extend the therapeutic effect. Massage therapy has its own uniqueness: first, the connectivity, massage therapy is a medical science. Not only to learn the theory of traditional Chinese medicine-related, while also required to master the relevant human anatomy, Western medical diagnostic methods, such as imaging and other theoretical knowledge; Second, the necessary effort to exercise. Massage doctors to conduct exercises and practices in long-term standardized training to acquire methods of operation tactics, techniques and basic role of massage treatments for each specific disease. In short, learning massage, not only to pay attention to theoretical study, but should be strengthened and rigorous exercise power law practices.
outcome: 完成本課程後，期望學生能達到以下學習成果： 1、 說出課程所講述的推拿功法、手法、常見病的病因病機、診斷、辯證治療 2、 理解功法鍛煉與手法練習的具體方法與辯證關係 3、 說出常用手法的臨床運用及操作 4、 組織課題研究以展示其在推拿學領域所具的深度知識

title: Surgery (Chinese Medicine)
requirements: For students in MChi.Med.
description: “Surgery (Chinese Medicine)” is one of the main clinical subjects and plays an important role in Chinese medicine. It is an art of healing using combined surgical and pharmacological approaches to treat many surgical and topical diseases under the holistic theories of Chinese medicine. This course will emphasize on the clinical diagnosis, treatment methods and surgical techniques used in Chinese medicine for the management of the common topical diseases. This course will provide a basis for the students to further their clinical, teaching or researching careers in Chinese medicine, and is the foundation for the students to become specialists in tropical diseases. The courses of “Principles of Chinese Medicines”, “Diagnostic Approaches in Chinese Medicine Practice”, “Chinese Materia Medica” and “Chinese Medicine Formulae” are the prerequisites for this course.
outcome: 完成本科目，期望學生能達到以下的學習成果： 1. 講述和解釋常見中醫外科疾病的臨床證候和病因病機。 2. 正確作出外科常見病的診斷和鑒別診斷。 3. 提出外科常見病的預防與調護措施。 4. 提出外科常見病的內治法及外治法。
syllabus: 發明中醫外科學術流派的主要學術思想和代表著作。 中醫外科學範圍、疾病命名及基本術語: 中醫外科學範圍；外科疾病的命名規律，命名方法及基本術語。 中醫外科疾病的病因病機: 外科疾病的常見病因和發病機理。 中醫外科疾病辨證: 辨病原則及程式；陰陽辨證；部位辨證；經絡辨證；局部辨證包括腫、腫塊、結節、疼痛、瘙癢、麻木、膿、潰瘍和出血的辨證檢查方法 中醫外科疾病治法: 消 托 補三大內治法；外治法包括藥物療法、手術療法及其他療法。 中醫外科調護: 一般護理和飲食護理的基本內容。 瘡瘍: 瘡瘍的定義、病因病機、分期轉歸及辨證論治；常見疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，常見疾病包括：癤（有頭癤、無頭癤、癤病）、疔（顔面部疔瘡、手足部疔瘡、紅絲疔、爛疔、疫疔）、癰（頸癰、腋癰、胯腹癰、委中癰、臍癰）、發（鎖喉癰、臀癰、手發背、足發背）、有頭疽、流注、丹毒、無頭疽（附骨疽、環跳疽）、走黃、內陷、流痰、瘰癧。 乳房疾病: 乳房疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，如乳癰、乳癆、乳漏、乳癖、乳癧、乳衄、乳岩。 癭: 氣癭、肉癭、石癭的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治。 瘤、岩:血瘤、脂瘤、繭唇、失榮、腎岩的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治。 皮膚及性傳播疾病: 皮膚及性傳播疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，如熱瘡、蛇串瘡、疣（尋常疣、扁平疣、傳染性軟疣）、風熱瘡、黃水瘡、癬、蟲咬皮炎、疥瘡、濕瘡、接觸性皮炎、藥毒、風瘙癢、癮疹、牛皮癬、貓眼瘡、白疕、白駁風、黧黑斑、粉刺、面遊風、酒齇鼻、油風、瓜藤纏、紅蝴蝶瘡、淋病、梅毒、尖銳濕疣、生殖器皰疹、愛滋病。 肛門直腸疾病: 肛門直腸疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，如痔（內痔、外痔、混合痔）、息肉痔、肛隱窩炎、肛癰、肛漏、肛裂、脫肛、鎖肛痔。 泌尿男性疾病: 泌尿男性疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，如慢性前列腺炎、前列腺增生症。 周圍血管疾病: 周圍血管疾病的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治，如股腫、脫疽。 其他外科疾病: 凍傷、燒傷、毒蛇咬傷、腸癰的特點、病因病機、診斷、鑒別診斷和辨證論治。

title: Internal Medicine (Chinese Medicine) I
requirements: For students in MChi.Med.
description: “Internal Medicine” is the foundation of all other clinical courses. It is a bridge between the basic theoretical courses and the clinical courses of Chinese medicine. “Internal Medicine (Chinese Medicine) I” deals with the common diseases of the pulmonary system, the cardiovascular system, the digestive system, and the qi, blood and body fluid system. The symptoms, etiology, diagnosis and treatment of these diseases are discussed.
outcome: 完成本課程後，學生期望能夠： 1. 記述所學之中醫內科學疾病的定義並能講述疾病的主要歷史沿革 2. 解釋疾病的病因病機，對疾病做出正確診斷和鑒別診斷 3. 對中醫內科學常見病證提出辨證論治、處方用藥及調護措施
syllabus: 1.感冒: 闡述感冒的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護2. 咳嗽:闡述咳嗽的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護3.哮病:闡述哮病的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護4.喘證:闡述喘證的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護5.肺癰:闡述肺癰的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護6.肺癆: 闡述肺癆的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護7.肺脹:闡述肺脹的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護8.肺痿:闡述肺痿的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護9.痰飲:闡述痰飲的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護10.心悸:闡述心悸的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護11.心痛:闡述心痛的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護12.不寐:闡述不寐的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護13.汗證:闡述汗證的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護14.血證:闡述血證的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護15.厥證:闡述厥證的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護16.癎病:闡述癎病的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護17.胃痛: 闡述胃痛的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護18.痞滿: 闡述痞滿的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護19.嘔吐: 闡述嘔吐的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護20.呃逆: 闡述呃逆的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護21.噎嗝: 闡述噎嗝的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護22.腹痛: 闡述腹痛的病因病機、臨床表現、診斷要點、鑒別診斷、辨證論治、處方用藥及預防調護
